tika-s0403t:5: 1. Pañcakanipātassa paṭhame kāmaṃ sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvopi balaṭṭho eva, paṭipakkhehi pana akampanīyattaṃ sātisayaṃ balaṭṭhoti vuttaṃ – “assaddhiye na kampatī”ti.
tika-s0403t:8: 2-6. Dutiye hirīyatīti lajjati virajjati. Yasmā hirī pāpajigucchanalakkhaṇā, tasmā “jigucchatīti attho”ti vuttaṃ. Ottappatīti utrasati. Pāputrāsalakkhaṇañhi ottappaṃ.
tika-s0403t:9_1: samucchinnatthāya. Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadā nāma samadhigamo evāti āha “paṭilābhatthāyā”ti.
tika-s0403t:10_0: Gatiatthā dhātusaddā buddhiatthā hontīti āha “udayañca vayañca paṭivijjhituṃ samatthāyā”ti.
tika-s0403t:10_1: Missakanayenāyaṃ desanā gatāti āha “vikkhambhanavasena ca samucchedavasena cā”ti.
tika-s0403t:10_2: Tenāha “vipassanāpaññāya ceva maggapaññāya cā”ti. Vipassanāpaññāya vikkhambhanakiriyato
tika-s0403t:10_3: sā ca kho padesikāti nippadesikaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “maggapaññāya paṭilābhasaṃvattanato”ti
tika-s0403t:10_4: vuttaṃ. Dukkhakkhayagāminibhāvepi eseva nayo. Sammāti yāthāvato. Akuppadhammatāya
tika-s0403t:10_5: hi maggapaññāya khepitaṃ khepitameva, nāssa puna khepanakiccaṃ atthīti upāyena ñāyena
tika-s0403t:10_6: sā pavattatīti āha “hetunā nayenā”ti. Tatiyādīsu natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t:13_0: 7. Sattame asanti lūnanti tenāti asitaṃ, dāttaṃ. Vividhā ābhañjanti bhāraṃ olambenti
tika-s0403t:13_1: tenāti byābhaṅgī, vidhaṃ. Kulaputtoti ettha duvidho kulaputto jātikulaputto, ācārakulaputto
tika-s0403t:13_2: ca. Tattha “tena kho pana samayena raṭṭhapālo nāma kulaputto tasmiṃyeva thullakoṭṭhike
tika-s0403t:13_3: aggakulikassa putto”ti evaṃ āgato uccakulappasuto jātikulaputto nāma. “Ye te kulaputtā
tika-s0403t:13_4: saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā”ti evaṃ āgatā pana yattha katthaci kule pasutāpi
tika-s0403t:13_5: ācārasampannā ācārakulaputto nāma. Idha pana ācārakulaputto adhippeto. Tenāha “kulaputtoti
tika-s0403t:13_6: ācārakulaputto”ti. Yuttanti anucchavikaṃ, evaṃ vattabbataṃ arahatīti attho. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-s0403t:16_0: 8. Aṭṭhame saddhāyāti iminā adhigamasaddhā dassitā. Catubbidhā hi saddhā – āgamanīyasaddhā,
tika-s0403t:16_1: adhigamasaddhā, pasādasaddhā, okappanasaddhāti. Tattha āgamanīyasaddhā sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ
tika-s0403t:16_2: pavattā hoti. Āgamanīyappaṭipadāya āgatā hi saddhā sātisayā mahābodhisattānaṃ paropadesena
tika-s0403t:16_3: vinā saddheyyavatthuṃ aviparītato gahetvā adhimuccanato. Saccappaṭivedhato āgatasaddhā
tika-s0403t:16_6: pakkhanditvā saddahanavasena kappanaṃ okappanaṃ, tadeva saddhāti okappanasaddhā.
tika-s0403t:16_7: Tattha pasādasaddhā paraneyyarūpā hoti, savanamattenapi pasīdanato. Okappanasaddhā
tika-s0403t:16_8: saddheyyaṃ vatthuṃ ogāhitvā anupavisitvā “evameta”nti paccakkhaṃ karontī viya pavattati.
tika-s0403t:19_0: 9. Navame appatissayoti appatissavo va-kārassa ya-kāraṃ katvā niddeso. Garunā kismiñci
tika-s0403t:19_1: vutto gāravavasena patissavanaṃ, patissavo, patissavabhūtaṃ, taṃsabhāvañca yaṃ kiñci
tika-s0403t:19_2: gāravaṃ. Natthi etasmiṃ patissavoti appatissavo, gāravavirahito. Tenāha “ajeṭṭhako anīcavuttī”ti.
tika-s0403t:22_0: 10. Dasame vuddhintiādīsu sīlena vuddhiṃ, maggena viruḷhiṃ, nibbānena vepullaṃ. Sīlasamādhīhi
tika-s0403t:22_1: vā vuddhiṃ, vipassanāmaggehi viruḷhiṃ, phalanibbānehi vepullaṃ. Ettha ca yassa catubbidhaṃ
tika-s0403t:22_2: sīlaṃ akhaṇḍādibhāvappavattiyā suparisuddhaṃ visesabhāgiyattā appakasireneva maggaphalāvahaṃ
tika-s0403t:22_3: saṅgharakkhitattherassa viya, so tādisena sīlena imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ āpajjissati.
tika-s0403t:22_4: Tena vuttaṃ – “sīlena vuddhi”nti. Yassa pana ariyamaggo uppanno, so virūḷhamūlo viya
tika-s0403t:22_5: pādapo suppatiṭṭhitattā sāsane virūḷhiṃ āpanno nāma hoti. Tena vuttaṃ – “maggena
tika-s0403t:22_6: virūḷhi”nti. Yo sabbakilesanibbānappatto, so arahā sīlādidhammakkhandhapāripūriyā
tika-s0403t:22_7: sati vepullappatto hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “nibbānena vepulla”nti. Dutiyavikappe attho
tika-s0403t:27_0: 11. Dutiyassa paṭhame abhijānitvāti abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena jānitvā. Aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi
tika-s0403t:27_1: tathāgatassāti “tathā āgatoti tathāgato. Tathā gatoti tathāgato. Tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti
tika-s0403t:27_2: tathāgato. Tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato. Tathadassitāya tathāgato.
tika-s0403t:27_3: Tathāvāditāya tathāgato. Tathākāritāya tathāgato. Abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato”ti
tika-s0403t:27_4: evaṃ vuttehi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi. Usabhassa idanti āsabhaṃ, seṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ. Tenāha “āsabhaṃ
tika-s0403t:27_5: ṭhānanti seṭṭhaṭṭhāna”nti. Parato dassitabalayogena “dasabaloha”nti abhītanādaṃ nadati.
tika-s0403t:27_6: Brahmacakkanti ettha seṭṭhapariyāyo. Brahmasaddoti āha “seṭṭhacakka”nti. Cakkañcetaṃ
tika-s0403t:30: 13. Tatiye kāmaṃ sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvopi balaṭṭho eva, paṭipakkhehi pana akampanīyattaṃ sātisayaṃ balaṭṭhoti vuttaṃ “muṭṭhassacce na kampatī”ti.
tika-s0403t:33_0: 14. Catutthe satinepakkenāti satiyā nepakkena, tikkhavisadasūrabhāvenāti attho. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0403t:33_1: pana nepakkaṃ nāma paññāti adhippāyena “nepakkaṃ vuccati paññā”ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sati
tika-s0403t:33_2: añño niddiṭṭho nāma hoti. Satimāti ca iminā savisesā sati gahitāti paratopi “cirakatampi
tika-s0403t:33_3: cirabhāsitampi saritā anussaritā”ti satikiccameva niddiṭṭhaṃ, na paññākiccaṃ, tasmā
tika-s0403t:33_4: satinepakkenāti satiyā nepakkabhāvenāti sakkā viññātuṃ labbhateva. Paccayavisesavasena
tika-s0403t:33_5: aññadhammanirapekkho satiyā balavabhāvo. Tathā hi ñāṇavippayuttacittenapi sajjhāyanasammasanāni sambhavanti.
tika-s0403t:34_0: Cirakatampīti attanā vā parena vā kāyena cirakataṃ cetiyaṅgaṇavattādimahāvattappaṭipattipūraṇaṃ.
tika-s0403t:34_1: Cirabhāsitampīti attanā vā parena vā vācāya cirabhāsitaṃ sakkaccaṃ uddisanauddisāpanadhammāsāraṇadhammadesanāupanisinnakaparikathāanumodanīyādivasena
tika-s0403t:34_2: pavattitaṃ vacīkammaṃ. Saritā anussaritāti tasmiṃ kāyena cirakate kāyo nāma kāyaviññatti,
tika-s0403t:34_3: cirabhāsite vācā nāma vacīviññatti, tadubhayampi rūpaṃ, taṃsamuṭṭhāpakā cittacetasikā
tika-s0403t:34_4: arūpaṃ. Iti ime rūpārūpadhammā evaṃ uppajjitvā evaṃ niruddhāti sarati ceva anussarati
tika-s0403t:34_5: ca, satisambojjhaṅgaṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti attho. Bojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpikā hi sati idha adhippetā.
tika-s0403t:34_6: Tāya satiyā esa sakiṃ saraṇena saritā, punappunaṃ saraṇena anussaritāti veditabbā.
tika-s0403t:37_0: 15-20. Pañcame savisayasmiṃyevāti attano attano visaye eva. Lokiyalokuttaradhamme
tika-s0403t:37_1: kathetunti lokiyadhamme lokuttaradhamme ca tena tena pavattivisesena kathetuṃ. Catūsu
tika-s0403t:37_3: imesu catūsu sotāpattimaggakāraṇesu. Kāmañca tesu satiādayopi dhammā icchitabbāva
tika-s0403t:37_4: tehi vinā tesaṃ asambhavato, tathāpi cettha saddhā visesato kiccakārīti veditabbā.
tika-s0403t:37_5: Saddho eva hi sappurise payirupāsati, saddhammaṃ suṇāti, yoniso ca aniccādito manasi
tika-s0403t:37_6: karoti, ariyamaggassa ca anudhammaṃ paṭipajjati, tasmā vuttaṃ “ettha saddhābalaṃ
tika-s0403t:37_7: daṭṭhabba”nti. Iminā nayena sesabalesupi attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0403t:38_1: eseva nayo. Ettha ca sotāpattiaṅgesu saddhā viya, sammappadhānabhāvanāya vīriyaṃ
tika-s0403t:38_2: viya ca satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya yasmā “vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassa”nti vacanato
tika-s0403t:38_3: pubbabhāge kiccato sati adhikā icchitabbā, evaṃ samādhikammikassa samādhi, “ariyasaccabhāvanā
tika-s0403t:38_4: paññābhāvanā”ti katvā tattha paññā pubbabhāge adhikā icchitabbāti pākaṭoyamattho.
tika-s0403t:38_5: Adhigamakkhaṇe pana samādhipaññānaṃ viya sabbesampi balānaṃ saddhādīnaṃ samatāva
tika-s0403t:38_6: icchitabbā. Tathā hi “ettha saddhābala”ntiādinā tattha tattha etthaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0403t:39_0: Idāni saddhādīnaṃ tattha tattha atirekakiccataṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi
tika-s0403t:39_1: vuttaṃ. Tatridaṃ upamā saṃsandanaṃ – rājapañcamasahāyā viya vimuttiparipācakāni pañca
tika-s0403t:39_2: balāni. Nesaṃ kīḷanatthaṃ ekajjhaṃ vīthiotaraṇaṃ viya balānaṃ ekajjhaṃ vipassanāvīthiotaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0403t:39_3: sahāyesu paṭhamādīnaṃ yathāsakaṃ geheva vicāraṇā viya saddhādīnaṃ sotāpattiaṅgādīni
tika-s0403t:39_4: patvā pubbaṅgamatā. Sahāyesu itaresaṃ tattha tattha tuṇhībhāvo viya sesabalānaṃ tattha
tika-s0403t:39_5: tattha tadanvayatā, tassa pubbaṅgamassa balassa kiccānugatā. Na hi tadā tesaṃ sasambhārapathavīādīsu
tika-s0403t:39_6: āpādīnaṃ viya kiccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, saddhādīnaṃyeva pana kiccaṃ vibhūtaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati
tika-s0403t:39_7: puretaraṃ tathāpaccayehi cittasantānassa abhisaṅkhatattā. Ettha ca vipassanākammikassa
tika-s0403t:39_8: bhāvanā visesato paññuttarāti dassanatthaṃ rājānaṃ nidassanaṃ katvā paññindriyaṃ
tika-s0403t:44: 21-22. Tatiyassa paṭhame ābhisamācārikanti abhisamācāre uttamasamācāre bhavaṃ. Kiṃ pana tanti āha “vattavasena paññattasīla”nti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva. Dutiye natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t:47_0: 23-24. Tatiye na ca pabhāvantanti na ca pabhāsampannaṃ. Pabhijjanasabhāvanti tāpetvā
tika-s0403t:47_1: tāḷakajjanapabhaṅguraṃ. Avasesaṃ lohanti vuttāvasesaṃ sajātilohaṃ, vijātilohaṃ, pisācalohaṃ,
tika-s0403t:47_2: kittimalohanti evaṃpabhedaṃ sabbampi lohaṃ. Uppajjituṃ appadānenāti ettha nanu lokiyakusalacittassapi
tika-s0403t:47_3: suvisuddhassapi uppajjituṃ appadāneneva upakkilesatāti? Saccametaṃ, yasmiṃ pana santāne
tika-s0403t:47_4: nīvaraṇāni laddhappatiṭṭhāni, tattha mahaggatakusalassapi asambhavo, pageva lokuttarakusalassa.
tika-s0403t:47_5: Parittakusalaṃ pana yathāpaccayaṃ uppajjamānaṃ nīvaraṇehi upahate santāne uppattiyā
tika-s0403t:47_7: padīpo viya. Apica nippariyāyato uppajjituṃ appadāneneva tesaṃ upakkilesatāti dassento
tika-s0403t:50_1: ayaṃ atthavaṇṇanā āraddhā, majjhimabhāṇakā panettha aññathā atthaṃ vadanti. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-s0403t:51_1: nibbattā cetovimutti phalaṃ assāti cetovimuttiphalā. Tadeva cetovimuttisaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0403t:51_2: phalaṃ ānisaṃso assāti cetovimuttiphalānisaṃsā. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. Ettha catutthaphalapaññā
tika-s0403t:51_3: paññāvimutti nāma, avasesā dhammā cetovimuttīti veditabbā. “Sīlānuggahitā”tiādīsu
tika-s0403t:51_4: sīlanti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ. Sutanti sappāyadhammassavanaṃ. Sākacchāti kammaṭṭhāne
tika-s0403t:51_5: khalanapakkhalanacchedanakathā. Samathoti vipassanāpādikā aṭṭha samāpattiyo. Vipassanāti
tika-s0403t:51_6: sattavidhā anupassanā. Catupārisuddhisīlañhi pūrentassa, sappāyadhammassavanaṃ suṇantassa,
tika-s0403t:51_7: kammaṭṭhāne khalanapakkhalanaṃ chindantassa vipassanāpādikāsu aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu
tika-s0403t:51_8: kammaṃ karontassa, sattavidhaṃ anupassanaṃ bhāventassa arahattamaggo uppajjitvā phalaṃ deti.
tika-s0403t:52_0: “Yathā hi madhuraṃ ambapakkaṃ paribhuñjitukāmo ambapotakassa samantā udakakoṭṭhakaṃ
tika-s0403t:52_1: thiraṃ katvā bandhati, ghaṭaṃ gahetvā kālena kālaṃ udakaṃ āsiñcati, udakassa anikkhamanatthaṃ
tika-s0403t:52_2: mariyādaṃ thiraṃ karoti. Yā hoti samīpe valli vā sukkhadaṇḍako vā kipillikapuṭo vā
tika-s0403t:52_3: makkaṭakajālaṃ vā, taṃ apaneti, khaṇittiṃ gahetvā kālena kālaṃ mūlāni parikhaṇati,
tika-s0403t:52_4: evamassa appamattassa imāni pañca kāraṇāni karoto so ambo vaḍḍhitvā phalaṃ deti,
tika-s0403t:52_5: evaṃ sampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ. Rukkhassa samantato koṭṭhakabandhanaṃ viya hi sīlaṃ
tika-s0403t:52_6: daṭṭhabbaṃ, kālena kālaṃ udakasiñcanaṃ viya dhammassavanaṃ, mariyādāya thirabhāvakaraṇaṃ
tika-s0403t:52_7: viya samatho, samīpe valliādīnaṃ haraṇaṃ viya kammaṭṭhāne khalanapakkhalanacchedanaṃ,
tika-s0403t:52_8: kālena kālaṃ khaṇittiṃ gahetvā mūlakhaṇanaṃ viya sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ bhāvanā,
tika-s0403t:52_9: tehi pañcahi kāraṇehi anuggahitassa ambarukkhassa madhuraphaladānakālo viya imassa
tika-s0403t:52_10: bhikkhuno imehi pañcahi dhammehi anuggahitāya sammādiṭṭhiyā arahattaphaladānaṃ veditabba”nti.
tika-s0403t:53_0: Ettha ca laddhūpakārāti yathārahaṃ nissayādivasena laddhapaccayā. Vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiyā
tika-s0403t:53_1: anuggahitabhāvena gahitattā maggasammādiṭṭhīsu ca arahattamaggasammādiṭṭhi. Anantarassa
tika-s0403t:53_2: hi vidhi paṭisedho vā, aggaphalasamādhimhi tapparikkhāradhammesuyeva ca kevalo cetopariyāyo
tika-s0403t:53_3: niruḷhoti sammādiṭṭhīti arahattamaggasammādiṭṭhi. Phalakkhaṇeti anantaraṃ kālantare
tika-s0403t:53_4: cāti duvidhepi phalakkhaṇe. Paṭippassaddhivasena sabbasaṃkilesehi cetovimuccati etāyāti
tika-s0403t:53_5: cetovimutti, aggaphalapaññaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā phaladhammā. Tenāha “cetovimutti phalaṃ
tika-s0403t:53_6: assāti, cetovimuttisaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ ānisaṃso”ti. Sabbakilesehi cetaso vimuccanasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0403t:53_7: paṭippassambhanasaññitaṃ pahānaṃ phalaṃ ānisaṃso cāti yojanā. Idha cetovimuttisaddena
tika-s0403t:53_8: pahānamattaṃ gahitaṃ, pubbe pahāyakadhammā. Aññathā phaladhammā eva ānisaṃsoti gayhamāne
tika-s0403t:53_9: punavacanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyā. Paññāvimuttiphalānisaṃsāti etthāpi evameva attho veditabbo.
tika-s0403t:53_10: Sammāvācākammantājīvā sīlasabhāvattā visesato samādhissa upakārā, tathā sammāsaṅkappo
tika-s0403t:53_11: jhānasabhāvattā. Tathā hi so “appanā”ti niddiṭṭho. Sammāsatisammāvāyāmā pana samādhipakkhiyā
tika-s0403t:54_1: Sutādīsupi eseva nayo. Attano cittappavattiārocanavasena saha kathanaṃ saṃkathā,
tika-s0403t:54_2: saṃkathāva sākacchā. Idha pana kammaṭṭhānappaṭibaddhāti āha “kammaṭṭhāne…pe… kathā”ti.
tika-s0403t:54_3: Tassa kammaṭṭhānassa ekavāraṃ vidhiyā appaṭipajjanaṃ khalanaṃ, anekavāraṃ pakkhalanaṃ,
tika-s0403t:54_4: tadubhayassa vicchedanī apanayanī kathā khalanapakkhalanacchedanakathā. Pūrentassāti
tika-s0403t:54_5: vivaṭṭasannissitaṃ katvā pālentassa brūhentassa ca. Suṇantassāti “yathāuggahitakammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0403t:54_6: phātiṃ gamissatī”ti evaṃ suṇantassa. Teneva hi “sappāyadhammassavana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:54_7: Kammaṃ karontassāti bhāvanānuyogakammaṃ karontassa. Pañcasupi ṭhānesu anta-saddo
tika-s0403t:54_8: hetuatthajotano daṭṭhabbo. Evañhi “yathā hī”tiādinā vuccamānā ambūpamā yujjeyya.
tika-s0403t:55_0: Udakakoṭṭhakanti jalāvāṭaṃ. Thiraṃ katvā bandhatīti asithilaṃ daḷhaṃ nātimahantaṃ
tika-s0403t:55_1: nātikhuddakaṃ katvā yojeti. Thiraṃ karotīti udakasiñcanakāle tato tato pavattitvā
tika-s0403t:55_2: udakassa anikkhamanatthaṃ jalāvāṭapāḷiṃ thirataraṃ karoti. Sukkhadaṇḍakoti tasseva
tika-s0403t:55_3: ambagacchassa sukkhako sākhāsīsako. Kipillikapuṭoti tambakipillikapuṭo. Khaṇittinti
tika-s0403t:55_4: kudālaṃ. Koṭṭhakabandhanaṃ viya sīlaṃ sammādiṭṭhiyā vaḍḍhanūpāyassa mūlabhāvato.
tika-s0403t:55_5: Udakasiñcanaṃ viya dhammassavanaṃ bhāvanāya paribrūhanato. Mariyādāya thirabhāvakaraṇaṃ
tika-s0403t:55_6: viya samatho yathāvuttāya bhāvanādhiṭṭhānāya sīlamariyādāya daḷhībhāvāpādanato. Samāhitassa
tika-s0403t:55_7: hi sīlaṃ thirataraṃ hoti. Samīpe valliādīnaṃ haraṇaṃ viya kammaṭṭhāne khalanapakkhalanacchedanaṃ
tika-s0403t:55_8: icchitabbabhāvanāya vibandhanāpanayanato. Mūlakhaṇanaṃ viya sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ
tika-s0403t:55_9: bhāvanā tassā vibandhassa mūlabhūtānaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīnaṃ palikhaṇanato. Ettha ca
tika-s0403t:55_10: yasmā suparisuddhasīlassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjantassa sappāyadhammassavanaṃ icchitabbaṃ,
tika-s0403t:55_11: tato yathāsute atthe sākacchāsamāpajjanaṃ, tato kammaṭṭhānavisodhanena samathanibbatti,
tika-s0403t:55_12: tato samāhitassa āraddhavipassakassa vipassanāpāripūri, paripuṇṇā vipassanā maggasammādiṭṭhiṃ
tika-s0403t:55_13: brūhetīti evametesaṃ aṅgānaṃ paramparāya sammukhā anuggaṇhanato ayamānupubbī kathitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t:58_0: 26. Chaṭṭhe vimuttiyā vaṭṭadukkhato vimuccanassa āyatanāni kāraṇāni vimuttāyatanānīti
tika-s0403t:58_1: āha – “vimuccanakāraṇānī”ti. Pāḷiatthaṃ jānantassāti “idha sīlaṃ āgataṃ, idha samādhi,
tika-s0403t:58_2: idha paññā”tiādinā taṃtaṃpāḷiatthaṃ yāthāvato jānantassa. Pāḷiṃ jānantassāti tadatthabodhiniṃ
tika-s0403t:58_3: pāḷiṃ yāthāvato upadhārentassa. Taruṇapītīti sañjātamattā mudukā pīti jāyati. Kathaṃ
tika-s0403t:58_4: jāyati? Yathādesitaṃ dhammaṃ upadhārentassa tadanucchavikameva attano kāyavācāmanosamācāraṃ
tika-s0403t:58_5: pariggaṇhantassa somanassaṃ pattassa pamodalakkhaṇaṃ pāmojjaṃ jāyati. Tuṭṭhākārabhūtā
tika-s0403t:58_6: balavapītīti purimuppannāya pītiyā vasena laddhāsevanattā ativiya tuṭṭhākārabhūtā
tika-s0403t:58_7: kāyacittadarathassa passambhanasamatthatāya passaddhiyā paccayo bhavituṃ samatthā
tika-s0403t:58_8: balappattā pīti jāyati. Yasmā nāmakāye passaddhe rūpakāyopi passaddho eva hoti, tasmā
tika-s0403t:59_0: Sukhaṃ paṭilabhatīti vakkhamānassa cittasamādhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ cetasikaṃ
tika-s0403t:59_1: nirāmisasukhaṃ paṭilabhati vindati. Samādhiyatīti ettha pana na yo koci samādhi adhippeto,
tika-s0403t:59_2: atha kho anuttarasamādhīti dassento “arahatta…pe… samādhiyatī”ti āha. “Ayaṃ hī”tiādi
tika-s0403t:59_3: tassaṃ desanāyaṃ tādisassa puggalassa yathāvuttasamādhipaṭilābhassa kāraṇabhāvavibhāvanaṃ,
tika-s0403t:59_4: yaṃ tathā vimuttāyatanabhāvo. Osakkitunti dassituṃ. Samādhiyeva samādhinimittanti
tika-s0403t:59_5: kammaṭṭhānapāḷiyā āruḷho samādhi eva parato uppajjanakabhāvanāsamādhissa kāraṇabhāvato
tika-s0403t:62_0: 27. Sattame sabbaso kilesadukkhadarathapariḷāhānaṃ vigatattā sātisayamettha sukhanti
tika-s0403t:62_1: vuttaṃ “appitappitakkhaṇe sukhattā paccuppannasukho”ti. Purimassa purimassa vasena
tika-s0403t:62_2: pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ laddhāsevanatāya santapaṇītatarabhāvappattaṃ hotīti āha “purimo…pe…
tika-s0403t:62_6: niggahetabbāni, aññe kilesā vāretabbā. Imassa pana arahattasamādhissa paṭippassaddhasabbakilesattā
tika-s0403t:62_7: na niggahetabbaṃ vāretabbañca atthīti maggānantaraṃ samāpattikkhaṇe ca appayogena
tika-s0403t:62_8: adhigatattā appitattā ca aparihānivasena vā appitattā na sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato.
tika-s0403t:62_9: Sativepullappattattāti etena appavattamānāyapi satiyā satibahulatāya sato eva nāmāti
tika-s0403t:62_10: dasseti. Yathāparicchinnakālavasenāti etena paricchinnassatiyā satoti dasseti. Sesesūti ñāṇesu.
tika-s0403t:65_0: 28-29. Aṭṭhame karo vuccati pupphasambhavaṃ “gabbhāsaye kirīyatī”ti katvā. Karato
tika-s0403t:65_1: jāto kāyo karajakāyo, tadupanissayo catusantatirūpasamudāyo. Kāmaṃ nāmakāyopi vivekajena
tika-s0403t:65_2: pītisukhena tathāladdhūpakāro, “abhisandetī”tiādivacanato pana rūpakāyo idha adhippetoti
tika-s0403t:65_3: āha “imaṃ karajakāya”nti. Abhisandetīti abhisandanaṃ karoti. Taṃ pana abhisandanaṃ
tika-s0403t:65_4: jhānamayena pītisukhena karajakāyassa tintabhāvāpādanaṃ sabbatthakameva lūkhabhāvāpanayananti
tika-s0403t:65_5: āha “temetī”tiādi. Tayidaṃ abhisandanaṃ atthato yathāvuttapītisukhasamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi
tika-s0403t:65_6: kāyassa parippharaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Parisandetītiādīsupi eseva nayo. Sabbaṃ etassa
tika-s0403t:65_7: atthīti sabbāvā, tassa sabbāvato. Avayavāvayavisambandhe avayavini sāmivacananti
tika-s0403t:65_8: avayavavisayo sabba-saddo, tasmā vuttaṃ “sabbakoṭṭhāsavato”ti. Aphuṭaṃ nāma na hoti
tika-s0403t:65_9: yattha yattha kammajarūpaṃ, tattha tattha cittajarūpassa abhibyāpanato. Tenāha “upādinnakasantatī”tiādi.
tika-s0403t:66_0: Chekoti kusalo. Taṃ panassa kosallaṃ nahānīyacuṇṇānaṃ karaṇe piṇḍikaraṇe ca samatthatāvasena
tika-s0403t:66_2: āgato.“Kaṃso upahato yathā”tiādīsu kittimalohe. Katthaci paṇṇattimatte “upakaṃso
tika-s0403t:66_3: nāma rājāsi, mahākaṃsassa atrajo”tiādi. Idha pana yattha katthaci loheti āha “yena
tika-s0403t:66_4: kenaci lohena katabhājane”ti. Snehānugatāti udakasinehena anuppavisanavasena gatā
tika-s0403t:66_5: upagatā. Snehaparetāti udakasinehena parito gatā samantato phuṭā. Tato eva santarabāhirā
tika-s0403t:66_6: phuṭā snehena. Etena sabbaso udakena temitabhāvamāha. Na ca pagghariṇīti etena tintassapi
tika-s0403t:67_0: Tāhi tāhi udakasirāhi ubbhijjatīti ubbhidaṃ, ubbhidaṃ udakaṃ etassāti ubbhidodako.
tika-s0403t:67_1: Ubbhinnaudakoti nadītīre khatakūpako viya ubbhijjanakaudako. Uggacchanaudakoti dhārāvasena
tika-s0403t:67_2: uṭṭhahanaudako. Kasmā panettha ubbhidodakova rahado gahito, na itaroti āha “heṭṭhā
tika-s0403t:67_4: ca. “Pheṇapaṭalehi cā”ti vattabbaṃ, sannisinnameva aparikkhobhatāya niccalameva,
tika-s0403t:68_1: attho. Yaṃ kiñci uppalaṃ uppalameva sāmaññaggahaṇato. Satapattanti ettha sata-saddo
tika-s0403t:68_2: bahupariyāyo “satagghī”tiādīsu viya. Tena anekasatapattassapi saṅgaho siddho hoti.
tika-s0403t:68_3: Loke pana rattaṃ padumaṃ, setaṃ puṇḍarīkanti vuccati. Yāva aggā yāva ca mūlā udakena
tika-s0403t:68_4: abhisandanādisambhavadassanatthaṃ udakānuggataggahaṇaṃ. Idha uppalādīni viya karajakāyo,
tika-s0403t:69_0: Yasmā parisuddhena cetasāti catutthajjhānacittamāha, tañca rāgādiupakkilesamalāpagamato
tika-s0403t:69_1: nirupakkilesaṃ nimmalaṃ, tasmā āha “nirupakkilesaṭṭhena parisuddha”nti. Yasmā pana
tika-s0403t:69_2: pārisuddhiyā eva paccayavisesena pavattiviseso pariyodātatā sudhantasuvaṇṇassa nighaṃsanena
tika-s0403t:69_3: pabhassaratā viya, tasmā āha “pabhassaraṭṭhena pariyodātaṃ veditabba”nti. Idanti
tika-s0403t:69_4: odātavacanaṃ. Utupharaṇatthanti utuno pharaṇadassanatthaṃ. Utupharaṇaṃ na hoti sesanti
tika-s0403t:69_5: adhippāyo. Tenāha “taṅkhaṇa …pe… balavaṃ hotī”ti. Vatthaṃ viya karajakāyoti yogino
tika-s0403t:69_6: karajakāyo vatthaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo utupharaṇasadisena catutthajjhānasukhena pharitabbattā.
tika-s0403t:69_7: Purisassa sarīraṃ viya catutthajjhānaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ utupharaṇaṭṭhāniyassa sukhassa
tika-s0403t:69_8: nissayabhāvato. Tenāha “tasmā”tiādi. Tattha ca “parisuddhena cetasā”ti cetogahaṇena
tika-s0403t:69_9: jhānasukhaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha “utupharaṇaṃ viya catutthajjhānasukha”nti.
tika-s0403t:69_10: Nanu ca catutthajjhāne sukhameva natthīti? Saccaṃ natthi, sātalakkhaṇasantasabhāvattā
tika-s0403t:69_11: panettha upekkhā “sukha”nti adhippetā. Tena vuttaṃ sammohavinodaniyaṃ “upekkhā pana
tika-s0403t:70: Tassa tassa samādhissa sarūpadassanassa paccayattā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇanimittaṃ. Samabharitoti samapuṇṇo.
tika-s0403t:71_0: Maṇḍabhūmīti papāvaṇṇabhūmi. Yattha salilasiñcanena vināva sassāni ṭhitāni sampajjanti.
tika-s0403t:71_1: Yuge yojetabbāni yoggāni, tesaṃ ācariyo yoggācariyo. Tesaṃ sikkhāpanato hatthiādayopi
tika-s0403t:71_2: “yoggā”ti vuccantīti āha pāḷiyaṃ “assadammasārathī”ti. Yena yenāti catūsu maggesu
tika-s0403t:71_3: yena yena maggena. Yaṃ yaṃ gatinti javasamajavādibhedāsu gatīsu yaṃ yaṃ gatiṃ. Navame natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t:74_0: 30. Dasame uccāsaddamahāsaddāti uddhaṃ uggatattā ucco patthaṭo mahanto vinibbhijjitvā
tika-s0403t:74_1: gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyo saddo etesanti uccāsaddamahāsaddā. Vacīghosopi hi bahūhi ekajjhaṃ
tika-s0403t:74_2: pavattito atthato saddato ca duravabodho kevalaṃ mahānigghoso eva hutvā sotapathamāgacchati.
tika-s0403t:74_3: Macchavilopeti macchānaṃ vilumpitvā viya gahaṇe, macchānaṃ vā vilumpane. Kevaṭṭānañhi
tika-s0403t:74_4: macchapacchiṭhapitaṭṭhāne mahājano sannipatitvā “idha aññaṃ ekaṃ macchaṃ dehi, ekaṃ
tika-s0403t:74_5: macchaphālaṃ dehī”ti, “etassa te mahā dinno, mayhaṃ khuddako”ti evaṃ uccāsaddaṃ mahāsaddaṃ
tika-s0403t:74_6: karonti. Macchaggahaṇatthaṃ jāle pakkhittepi tasmiṃ ṭhāne kevaṭṭā ceva aññe ca “paviṭṭho
tika-s0403t:74_7: gahito”ti mahāsaddaṃ karonti. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Asucisukhanti kāyāsucisannissitattā
tika-s0403t:74_8: kilesāsucisannissitattā ca asucisannissitasukhaṃ. Nekkhammasukhassāti kāmato nikkhamantassa
tika-s0403t:74_9: sukhassa. Pavivekasukhassāti gaṇasaṅgaṇikato kilesasaṅgaṇikato ca vigatassa sukhassa.
tika-s0403t:79_0: 31. Catutthassa paṭhame satakkakūti satasikharo, anekakūṭoti attho. Idaṃ tassa mahāmeghabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-s0403t:79_1: So hi mahāvassaṃ vassati. Tenevāha – “ito cito ca uṭṭhitena valāhakakūṭasatena samannāgatoti
tika-s0403t:79_2: attho”ti. Dassanasampannoti ettha dassanaṃ nāma sotāpattimaggo. So hi paṭhamaṃ nibbānadassanato
tika-s0403t:79_3: “dassana”nti vuccati. Yadipi taṃ gotrabhu paṭhamataraṃ passati, disvā pana kattabbakiccassa
tika-s0403t:79_4: kilesappahānassa akaraṇato na taṃ “dassana”nti vuccati. Āvajjanaṭṭhāniyañhi taṃ ñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0403t:79_5: Maggassa nibbānārammaṇatāsāmaññena cetaṃ vuttaṃ, na nibbānappaṭivijjhanena, tasmā
tika-s0403t:79_6: dhammacakkhuṃ punappunaṃ nibbattanena bhāvanaṃ appattaṃ dassanaṃ, dhammacakkhuñca
tika-s0403t:82_0: 32. Dutiye “ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato”tiādīsu ariyakantānīti pañcasīlāni āgatāni.
tika-s0403t:82_1: Ariyakantāni hi pañcasīlāni ariyānaṃ kantāni piyāni, bhavantaragatāpi ariyā tāni
tika-s0403t:82_2: na vijahanti. Idha pana “yāvatā, cunda, sīlāni ariyakantāni sīlāni, tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati…pe…
tika-s0403t:82_3: agge te paripūrakārino”ti vuttattā maggaphalāni sīlāni adhippetānīti āha “ariyakantāni
tika-s0403t:85_0: 33. Tatiye sabbapaṭhamaṃ uṭṭhānasīlāti rattiyā vibhāyanavelāya sāmike parijane seyyāya
tika-s0403t:85_1: avuṭṭhite sabbapaṭhamaṃ uṭṭhānasīlā. Sāmikaṃ disvā nisinnāsanato aggidaḍḍhā viya
tika-s0403t:85_2: paṭhamameva vuṭṭhahantīti vā pubbuṭṭhāyiniyo. Kiṃkāranti kiṃkaraṇīyaṃ, kiṃkaraṇabhāvena
tika-s0403t:85_3: pucchitvā kātabbaveyyāvaccanti attho. Taṃ paṭissuṇantā vicarantīti kiṃkārappaṭissāviniyo.
tika-s0403t:85_4: Manāpaṃyeva kiriyaṃ karonti sīlenāti manāpacāriniyo. Piyameva vadanti sīlenāti piyavādiniyo.
tika-s0403t:86_0: Tatrupāyāyāti tatra kamme sādhetabbaupāyabhūtāya vīmaṃsāya. Tenāha “tasmiṃ uṇṇākappāsasaṃvidhāne”tiādi.
tika-s0403t:86_1: Alaṃ kātunti kātuṃ samatthā. Alaṃ saṃvidhātunti vicāretuṃ samatthā. Tenāha “alaṃ
tika-s0403t:86_2: kātuṃ alaṃ saṃvidhātunti attanā kātumpi parehi kārāpetumpī”tiādi. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0403t:89_0: 34-35. Catutthe sandiṭṭhikanti asamparāyikatāya sāmaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sayaṃ anubhavitabbaṃ
tika-s0403t:89_1: attapaccakkhaṃ diṭṭhadhammikanti attho. Na saddhāmattakeneva tiṭṭhatīti “dānaṃ nāma
tika-s0403t:89_2: sādhu sundaraṃ, buddhādīhi paṇḍitehi pasattha”nti evaṃ saddhāmattakeneva na tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0403t:89_3: Yaṃ dānaṃ detīti yaṃ deyyadhammaṃ parassa deti. Tassa pati hutvāti tabbisayaṃ lobhaṃ
tika-s0403t:89_4: suṭṭhu abhibhavanto tassa adhipati hutvā deti. Tena anadhibhavanīyattā na dāso na
tika-s0403t:89_5: sahāyoti. Tattha tadubhayaṃ anvayato byatirekato ca dassetuṃ “yo hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:89_6: Dāso hutvā deti taṇhādāsabyassa upagatattā. Sahāyo hutvā deti tassa piyabhāvāvissajjanato.
tika-s0403t:89_7: Sāmī hutvā deti tattha taṇhādāsabyato attānaṃ mocetvā abhibhuyya pavattanato. Atha
tika-s0403t:89_8: vā yo dānasīlatāya dāyako puggalo, so dāne pavattibhedena dānadāso, dānasahāyo, dānapatīti
tika-s0403t:89_9: tippakāro hoti. Tadassa tippakārataṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “yo hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Dātabbaṭṭhena dānaṃ, annapānādi.
tika-s0403t:90_0: Tattha yaṃ attanā paribhuñjati, taṇhādhipannatāya tassa vasena vattanato dāso viya
tika-s0403t:90_1: hoti. Yaṃ paresaṃ dīyati, tatthāpi annapānasāmaññena idaṃ vuttaṃ “dānasaṅkhātassa
tika-s0403t:90_2: deyyadhammassa dāso hutvā”ti. Sahāyo hutvā deti attanā paribhuñjitabbassa paresaṃ
tika-s0403t:90_3: dātabbassa ca samasamaṃ ṭhapanato. Pati hutvā deti sayaṃ deyyadhammassa vase avattitvā
tika-s0403t:90_4: tassa attano vase vattāpanato. Aparo nayo – yo attanā paṇītaṃ paribhuñjitvā paresaṃ
tika-s0403t:90_5: nihīnaṃ deti, so dānadāso nāma tannimittanihīnabhāvāpattito. Yo yādisaṃ attanā paribhuñjati,
tika-s0403t:90_6: tādisameva paresaṃ deti, so dānasahāyo nāma tannimittahīnādhikabhāvavivajjanena sadisabhāvāpattito.
tika-s0403t:90_7: Yo attanā nihīnaṃ paribhuñjitvā paresaṃ paṇītaṃ deti, so dānapati nāma tannimittaseṭṭhabhāvāpattito.
tika-s0403t:91_0: Nittejabhūto tejahānippattiyā. Saha byati gacchatīti sahabyo, sahapavattanako, tassa
tika-s0403t:91_1: bhāvo sahabyatā, sahapavattīti āha “sahabhāvaṃ ekībhāvaṃ gatā”ti. Asitassāti vā abandhassa,
tika-s0403t:94_0: 36-37. Chaṭṭhe ārāmatoti phalārāmato. Paṭhamuppannānīti sabbapaṭhamaṃ sujātāni. Bhāsitaññūti
tika-s0403t:94_1: bhikkhū gharadvāre ṭhitā kiñcāpi tuṇhī honti, atthato pana “bhikkhaṃ dethā”ti vadanti
tika-s0403t:94_2: nāma ariyāya yācanāya. Vuttañhetaṃ “uddhissa ariyā tiṭṭhanti, esā ariyānaṃ yācanā”ti.
tika-s0403t:94_3: Tatra ye “mayaṃ pacāma, ime na pacanti, pacamāne patvā alabhantā kuhiṃ labhissantī”ti
tika-s0403t:94_4: deyyadhammaṃ saṃvibhajanti, te bhāsitaññū nāma ñatvā kattabbassa karaṇato. Yuttappattakāleti
tika-s0403t:94_5: dātuṃ yuttappattakāle. Appaṭivānacittoti anivattanacitto. Sattamaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0403t:97_0: 38. Aṭṭhame anukampantīti “sabbe sattā sukhī hontu averā abyāpajjā”ti evaṃ hitapharaṇena
tika-s0403t:97_1: anuggaṇhanti. Apica upaṭṭhākānaṃ gehaṃ aññe sīlavante sabrahmacārino gahetvā pavisantāpi
tika-s0403t:97_2: anuggaṇhanti nāma. Nīcavuttinti paṇipātasīlaṃ. Kodhamānathaddhatāya rahitanti kodhamānavasena
tika-s0403t:97_3: uppanno yo thaddhabhāvo cittassa uddhumātalakkhaṇo, tena virahitanti attho. Soraccenāti
tika-s0403t:97_4: “tattha katamaṃ soraccaṃ? Yo kāyiko avītikkamo, vācasiko avītikkamo, kāyikavācasiko
tika-s0403t:97_5: avītikkamo, idaṃ vuccati soraccaṃ. Sabbopi sīlasaṃvaro soracca”nti evamāgatena sīlasaṃvarasaṅkhātena
tika-s0403t:97_6: soratabhāvena. Sakhilanti “tattha katamaṃ sākhalyaṃ? Yā sā vācā thaddhakā kakkasā
tika-s0403t:97_7: pharusā kaṭukā abhisajjanī kodhasāmantā asamādhisaṃvattanikā, tathārūpiṃ vācaṃ pahāya
tika-s0403t:97_8: yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇasukhā pemanīyā hadayaṅgamā porī bahujanakantā bahujanamanāpā,
tika-s0403t:97_9: tathārūpiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti. Yā tattha saṇhavācatā sakhilavācatā apharusavācatā,
tika-s0403t:97_10: idaṃ vuccati sākhalya”nti evaṃ vuttena sammodakamudubhāvena samannāgataṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0403t:100_0: 39-40. Navame bhatoti posito. Taṃ pana bharaṇaṃ jātakālato paṭṭhāya sukhapaccayūpaharaṇena
tika-s0403t:100_1: dukkhapaccayāpaharaṇena ca pavattitanti dassetuṃ “amhehī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Hatthapādavaḍḍhanādīhīti
tika-s0403t:100_3: santakaṃ khettādiṃ avināsetvā rakkhitaṃ tesaṃ paramparāya ṭhitiyā kāraṇaṃ hotīti
tika-s0403t:100_4: āha “amhākaṃ santakaṃ…pe… kulavaṃso ciraṃ ṭhassatī”ti. Salākabhattādīni anupacchinditvāti
tika-s0403t:100_5: salākabhattādīni avicchinditvā. Yasmā dāyajjappaṭilābhassa yogyabhāvena vattamānoyeva
tika-s0403t:100_6: dāyassa paṭipajjissati, na itaroti āha “kulavaṃsānurūpāya paṭipattiyā”tiādi. Attanā
tika-s0403t:100_7: dāyajjārahaṃ karontoti attānaṃ dāyajjārahaṃ karonto. Mātāpitaro hi attano ovāde avattamāne
tika-s0403t:100_8: micchāpaṭipanne dārake vinicchayaṃ gantvā aputte karonti, te dāyajjārahā na honti.
tika-s0403t:100_9: Ovāde vattamāne pana kulasantakassa sāmike karonti. Tatiyadivasato paṭṭhāyāti matadivasato
tika-s0403t:100_10: tatiyadivasato paṭṭhāya. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva. Dasamaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0403t:105_0: 41-42. Pañcamassa paṭhame uṭṭhānavīriyādhigatehīti vā uṭṭhānena ca vīriyena ca adhigatehi.
tika-s0403t:105_1: Tattha uṭṭhānanti kāyikaṃ vīriyaṃ. Vīriyanti cetasikanti vadanti. Uṭṭhānanti vā bhoguppādane
tika-s0403t:105_2: yuttappayuttatā. Vīriyaṃ tajjo ussāho. Pīṇitanti dhātaṃ sutittaṃ. Tathābhūto pana
tika-s0403t:105_3: yasmā thūlasarīro hoti, tasmā “thūlaṃ karotī”ti vuttaṃ. Dutiyaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0403t:108_0: 43. Tatiye appamādaṃ pasaṃsantīti “etāni āyuādīni patthayantena appamādo kātabbo”ti
tika-s0403t:108_1: appamādameva pasaṃsanti paṇḍitā. Yasmā vā puññakiriyāsu paṇḍitā appamādaṃ pasaṃsanti,
tika-s0403t:108_2: tasmā āyuādīni patthayantena appamādova kātabboti attho. Purimasmiṃ atthavikappe
tika-s0403t:108_3: “puññakiriyāsū”ti padassa “appamatto”ti iminā sambandho. Yasmā paṇḍitā appamādaṃ
tika-s0403t:108_4: pasaṃsanti, yasmā ca puññakiriyāsu appamatto ubho atthe adhigato hoti, tasmā āyuādīni
tika-s0403t:108_5: patthayantena appamādova kātabbo. Dutiyasmiṃ atthavikappe paṇḍitā appamādaṃ pasaṃsanti.
tika-s0403t:108_6: Katthāti? Puññakiriyāsu. Kasmāti ce? Yasmā appamatto ubho atthe adhiggaṇhāti paṇḍito,
tika-s0403t:111_0: 44. Catutthe jhānamanena nibbattaṃ manomayanti āha “suddhāvāsesu ekaṃ jhānamanena
tika-s0403t:111_1: nibbattaṃ devakāya”nti. Satipi hi sabbasattānaṃ abhisaṅkhāramanasā nibbattabhāve
tika-s0403t:111_2: bāhirapaccayehi vinā manasāva nibbattattā “manomayā”ti vuccanti rūpāvacarasattā.
tika-s0403t:111_3: Yadi evaṃ kāmabhave opapātikasattānampi manomayabhāvo āpajjatīti ce? Na, tattha bāhirapaccayehi
tika-s0403t:111_4: nibbattetabbatāsaṅkāya eva abhāvato “manasāva nibbattā”ti avadhāraṇāsambhavato. Niruḷho
tika-s0403t:111_5: vāyaṃ loke manomayavohāro rūpāvacarasattesu. Tathā hi “annamayo, pāṇamayo, manomayo,
tika-s0403t:111_6: ānandamayo, viññāṇamayo”ti pañcadhā attānaṃ vedavādinopi vadanti. Ucchedavādinopi
tika-s0403t:111_7: vadanti “dibbo rūpī manomayo”ti. Tīsu vā kulasampattīsūti brāhmaṇakhattiyavessasaṅkhātesu
tika-s0403t:111_8: sampannakulesu. Chasu vā kāmasaggesūti chasu kāmāvacaradevesu.
tika-s0403t:114_0: 45-46. Pañcame asaṅkheyyoti āḷhakagaṇanāya asaṅkheyyo. Yojanavasena panassa saṅkhā
tika-s0403t:114_1: atthi heṭṭhā mahāpathaviyā upari ākāsena parisamantato cakkavāḷapabbatena majjhe
tika-s0403t:114_2: tattha tattha ṭhitakehi dīpapabbatapariyantehi paricchinnattā jānantena yojanato
tika-s0403t:114_4: saviññāṇakānaṃ balavāmukhapātālādīnaṃ aviññāṇakānaṃ bheravārammaṇānaṃ vasena bahubheravaṃ.
tika-s0403t:114_5: Puthūti bahū. Savantīti sandamānā. Upayantīti upagacchanti. Chaṭṭhaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0403t:117_0: 47-48. Sattame saddhāti maggenāgatā saddhā. Sīlañca yassa kalyāṇanti kalyāṇasīlaṃ
tika-s0403t:117_1: nāma ariyasāvakassa ariyakantaṃ sīlaṃ vuccati. Tattha kiñcāpi ariyasāvakassa ekasīlampi
tika-s0403t:117_2: akantaṃ nāma natthi, imasmiṃ panatthe bhavantarepi appahīnaṃ pañcasīlaṃ adhippetaṃ.
tika-s0403t:120: 49. Navame patitakkhandhoti sammukhā kiñci oloketuṃ asamatthatāya adhomukho. Nippaṭibhānoti sahadhammikaṃ kiñci vattuṃ avisahanato nippaṭibhāno paṭibhānarahito.
tika-s0403t:123_0: 50. Dasame ajjhomucchitoti adhimattāya taṇhāmucchāya mucchito, mucchaṃ mohaṃ pamādaṃ
tika-s0403t:123_1: āpanno. Tenāha “gilitvā…pe… atirekamucchāya taṇhāya samannāgato”ti. Mahaccāti mahatiyā.
tika-s0403t:130_0: 51-52. Dutiyassa paṭhame āvarantīti āvaraṇā, nīvārayantīti nīvaraṇā. Ettha ca āvarantīti
tika-s0403t:130_1: kusaladhammuppattiṃ ādito parivārenti. Nīvārayantīti niravasesato vārayantīti attho,
tika-s0403t:130_2: tasmā āvaraṇavasenāti ādito kusaluppattivāraṇavasena. Nīvaraṇavasenāti niravasesato
tika-s0403t:130_3: vāraṇavasenāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Yasmā pañca nīvaraṇā uppajjamānā anuppannāya
tika-s0403t:130_4: lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya uppajjituṃ na denti, uppannāpi aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca
tika-s0403t:130_5: vā abhiññā upacchinditvā pātenti, tasmā “paññāya dubbalīkaraṇā”ti vuccanti. Upacchindanaṃ
tika-s0403t:130_6: pātanañcettha tāsaṃ paññānaṃ anuppannānaṃ uppajjituṃ appadānameva. Iti mahaggatānuttarapaññānaṃ
tika-s0403t:130_7: ekaccāya ca parittapaññāya anuppattihetubhūtā nīvaraṇadhammā itarāsaṃ samatthataṃ
tika-s0403t:130_8: vihanantiyevāti paññāya dubbalīkaraṇā vuttā. Bhāvanāmanasikārena vinā pakatiyā manussehi
tika-s0403t:130_9: nibbattetabbo dhammoti manussadhammo, manussattabhāvāvaho vā dhammo manussadhammo,
tika-s0403t:130_10: anuḷāraṃ parittakusalaṃ. Yaṃ asatipi buddhuppāde vattati, yañca sandhāyāha “hīnena
tika-s0403t:130_11: brahmacariyena, khattiye upapajjatī”ti. Alaṃ ariyāya ariyabhāvāyāti alamariyo, ariyabhāvāya
tika-s0403t:130_12: samatthoti vuttaṃ hoti. Ñāṇadassanameva ñāṇadassanaviseso, alamariyo ca so ñāṇadassanaviseso
tika-s0403t:131_0: Ñāṇadassananti ca dibbacakkhupi vipassanāpi maggopi phalampi paccavekkhaṇañāṇampi
tika-s0403t:131_1: sabbaññutaññāṇampi vuccati. “Appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṃ ārādhetī”ti hi ettha dibbacakkhu
tika-s0403t:131_2: ñāṇadassanaṃ nāma. “Ñāṇadassanāya cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmetī”ti ettha vipassanāñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0403t:131_3: “Abhabbā te ñāṇāya dassanāya anuttarāya sambodhāyā”ti ettha maggo. “Ayamañño uttarimanussadhammā
tika-s0403t:131_4: alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti ettha phalaṃ. “Ñāṇañca pana me
tika-s0403t:131_5: dassanaṃ udapādi, akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti ettha
tika-s0403t:131_6: paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. “Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādi ‘sattāhakālakato āḷāro kālāmo”’ti
tika-s0403t:131_7: ettha sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. Idha pana lokuttaradhammo adhippeto. Ettha ca rūpāyatanaṃ
tika-s0403t:131_8: jānāti cakkhuviññāṇaṃ viya passati cāti ñāṇadassanaṃ, dibbacakkhu. Sammasanūpacāre
tika-s0403t:131_9: ca dhammalakkhaṇattayañca tathā jānāti passati cāti ñāṇadassanaṃ, vipassanā. Nibbānaṃ
tika-s0403t:131_10: cattāri vā saccāni asammohappaṭivedhato jānāti passati cāti ñāṇadassanaṃ, maggo.
tika-s0403t:131_11: Phalaṃ pana nibbānavaseneva yojetabbaṃ. Paccavekkhaṇā maggādhigatassa atthassa sabbaso
tika-s0403t:131_12: jotanaṭṭhena ñāṇadassanaṃ. Sabbaññutā anāvaraṇatāya samantacakkhutāya ca ñāṇadassanaṃ.
tika-s0403t:134_0: 53-54. Tatiye padahatīti padahano, bhāvanamanuyutto yogī, tassa bhāvo bhāvanānuyogo
tika-s0403t:134_1: padahanabhāvo. Padhānamassa atthīti padhāniko, ka-kārassa ya-kāraṃ katvā “padhāniyo”ti
tika-s0403t:134_3: paṇidhānato pabhuti āgatasaddhā āgamanasaddā eva, ukkaṭṭhaniddesena pana “sabbaññubodhisattāna”nti
tika-s0403t:134_4: vuttaṃ. Adhigamato samudāgatattā aggamaggaphalasampayuttā cāpi adhigamasaddhā nāma,
tika-s0403t:134_5: yā sotāpannassa aṅgabhāvena vuttā. Acalabhāvenāti paṭipakkhena anadhibhavanīyattā
tika-s0403t:134_6: niccalabhāvena. Okappananti okkanditvā adhimuccanaṃ, pasāduppattiyā pasādanīyavatthusmiṃ
tika-s0403t:134_7: pasīdanameva. Suppaṭividdhanti suṭṭhu paṭividdhaṃ. Yathā tena paṭividdhena sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
tika-s0403t:134_8: hatthagataṃ ahosi, tathā paṭividdhaṃ. Yassa buddhasubuddhatāya saddhā acalā asampavedhi,
tika-s0403t:134_9: tassa dhammasudhammatāya saṅghasuppaṭipannatāya tena paṭivedhena saddhā na tathāti
tika-s0403t:134_10: aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso. Tenāha bhagavā – “yo, bhikkhave, buddhe pasanno dhamme pasanno
tika-s0403t:134_11: saṅghe pasanno”tiādi. Padhānavīriyaṃ ijjhati “addhā imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇato
tika-s0403t:135_0: Appa-saddo abhāvattho “appasaddassa…pe… kho panā”tiādīsu viyāti āha “arogo”ti. Samavepākiniyāti
tika-s0403t:135_1: yathābhuttamāhāraṃ samākāreneva pacanasīlāya. Daḷhaṃ katvā pacantī hi gahaṇī ghorabhāvena
tika-s0403t:135_2: pittavikārādivasena rogaṃ janeti, sithilaṃ katvā pacantī mandabhāvena vātavikārādivasena
tika-s0403t:135_3: tenāha “nātisītāya nāccuṇhāyā”ti. Gahaṇitejassa mandapaṭutāvasena sattānaṃ yathākkamaṃ
tika-s0403t:135_4: sītuṇhasahatāti āha “atisītalaggahaṇiko”tiādi. Yāthāvato accayadesanā attano āvikaraṇaṃ
tika-s0403t:135_5: nāmāti āha “yathābhūtaṃ attano aguṇaṃ pakāsetā”ti. Udayatthagāminiyāti saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-s0403t:135_6: udayañca vayañca paṭivijjhantiyāti ayamettha atthoti āha “udayañcā”tiādi. Parisuddhāyāti
tika-s0403t:135_7: nirupakkilesāya. Nibbijjhituṃ samatthāyāti tadaṅgavasena savisesaṃ pajahituṃ samatthāya.
tika-s0403t:135_8: Tassa dukkhassa khayagāminiyāti yaṃ dukkhaṃ imasmiṃ ñāṇe anadhigate pavattirahaṃ,
tika-s0403t:135_9: adhigate na pavatti, taṃ sandhāya vadati. Tathāhesa yogāvacaro “cūḷasotāpanno”ti
tika-s0403t:138: 55. Pañcame vissāsoti visacchāyasantāno bhāvo. Otāroti tattha cittassa anuppaveso. Gahetvāti attano eva okāsaṃ gahetvā. Khepetvāti kusalavāraṃ khepetvā.
tika-s0403t:139_0: Ghaṭṭeyyāti akkamanādivasena bādheyya. Tīhi pariññāhīti ñātatīraṇappahānasaṅkhātāhi
tika-s0403t:139_1: tīhi pariññāhi. Natthi etesaṃ kutoci bhayanti akutobhayā, nibbhayāti attho. Catunnaṃ
tika-s0403t:139_2: oghānaṃ, saṃsāramahoghasseva vā pāraṃ pariyantaṃ gatā. Tenāha “pāraṃ vuccati nibbāna”ntiādi.
tika-s0403t:142_0: 56. Chaṭṭhe madhurakabhāvo nāma sarīrassa thambhitattaṃ, taṃ pana garubhāvapubbakanti
tika-s0403t:142_1: āha “sañjātagarubhāvo”ti. Na pakkhāyantīti nappakāsenti, nānākāraṇato na upaṭṭhahanti.
tika-s0403t:142_2: Tenāha “catasso disā ca anudisā ca mayhaṃ na upaṭṭhahantī”ti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-s0403t:145_0: 57. Sattame jarādhammoti dhamma-saddo “asammosadhammo nibbāna”ntiādīsu viya pakatipariyāyo,
tika-s0403t:145_1: tasmā jarāpakatiko jiṇṇasabhāvoti attho. Tenāha “jarāsabhāvo”tiādi. Sesapadesupi
tika-s0403t:145_2: eseva nayo. Kammunā dātabbaṃ ādiyatīti kammadāyādo, attanā yathūpacitakammaphalabhāgīti
tika-s0403t:145_3: attho. Taṃ pana dāyajjaṃ kāraṇūpacārena vadanto “kammaṃ mayhaṃ dāyajjaṃ santakanti
tika-s0403t:145_4: attho”ti āha yathā “kusalānaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ samādānahetu, evamidaṃ puññaṃ
tika-s0403t:145_5: vaḍḍhatī”ti. Yonīhi phalaṃ sabhāvato bhinnampi abhinnaṃ viya missitaṃ hoti. Tenāha
tika-s0403t:145_6: “kammaṃ mayhaṃ yoni kāraṇa”nti. Mamattavasena bajjhantīti bandhū, ñāti sālohito ca,
tika-s0403t:145_7: kammaṃ pana ekantasambandhavāti āha “kammaṃ mayhaṃ bandhū”ti. Patiṭṭhāti avassayo.
tika-s0403t:146_0: Yobbanaṃ ārabbha uppannamadoti “mahallakakāle puññaṃ karissāma, daharamha tāvā”ti
tika-s0403t:146_1: yobbanaṃ apassāya mānakaraṇaṃ. “Ahaṃ nirogo saṭṭhi vā sattati vā vassāni atikkantāni,
tika-s0403t:146_2: na me harītakakhaṇḍampi khāditabbaṃ, ime panaññe ‘asukaṃ no ṭhānaṃ rujjati, bhesajjaṃ
tika-s0403t:146_3: khādāmā’ti vicaranti, ko añño mayā sadiso nirogo nāmā”ti evaṃ mānakaraṇaṃ ārogyamado.
tika-s0403t:146_4: Sabbesampi jīvitaṃ nāma pabhaṅguraṃ dukkhānubandhañca, tadubhayaṃ anoloketvā pabandhaṭṭhitiṃ
tika-s0403t:146_5: paccayasulabhatañca nissāya “ciraṃ jīviṃ, ciraṃ jīvāmi, ciraṃ jīvissāmi, sukhaṃ jīviṃ,
tika-s0403t:146_6: sukhaṃ jīvāmi, sukhaṃ jīvissāmī”ti evaṃ mānakaraṇaṃ jīvitamado.
tika-s0403t:147_0: Upadhirahitanti kāmūpadhirahitaṃ. Cattāro hi upadhī – kāmūpadhi, khandhūpadhi, kilesūpadhi,
tika-s0403t:147_1: abhisaṅkhārūpadhīti. Kāmāpi “yaṃ pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ,
tika-s0403t:147_2: ayaṃ kāmānaṃ assādo”ti evaṃ vuttassa sukhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato “upadhiyati ettha
tika-s0403t:147_3: sukha”nti iminā vacanatthena “upadhī”ti vuccati, khandhāpi khandhamūlakassa dukkhassa
tika-s0403t:147_4: adhiṭṭhānabhāvato, kilesāpi apāyadukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato, abhisaṅkhārāpi bhavadukkhassa
tika-s0403t:150_0: 58-60. Aṭṭhame sāpateyyanti ettha saṃ vuccati dhanaṃ, tassa patīti sapati, dhanasāmiko.
tika-s0403t:150_1: Tassa hitāvahattā sāpateyyaṃ, drabyaṃ, dhananti attho. Attano rucivasena gāmakiccaṃ
tika-s0403t:151_0: Anvāya upanissāya jīvanasīlā anujīvinoti āha “ye ca etaṃ upanissāya jīvantī”ti. Ekaṃ
tika-s0403t:151_1: mahākulaṃ nissāya paṇṇāsampi saṭṭhipi kulāni jīvanti, te manusse sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:156_0: 61-65. Dutiyassa paṭhame “mahapphalā mahānisaṃsā”ti ubhayampetaṃ atthato ekaṃ, byañjanameva
tika-s0403t:156_2: phalapariyāyopi hoti. Mahato lokuttarassa sukhassa paccayā hontīti mahānisaṃsā. Amatogadhāti
tika-s0403t:156_3: amatabbhantarā amataṃ anuppaviṭṭhā nibbānadiṭṭhattā, tato paraṃ na gacchanti. Tena
tika-s0403t:156_4: vuttaṃ “amatapariyosānā”ti. Amataṃ pariyosānaṃ avasānaṃ etāsanti amatapariyosānā.
tika-s0403t:156_5: Maraṇasaññāti maraṇānupassanāñāṇena saññā. Āhāre paṭikūlasaññāti āhāraṃ gamanādivasena
tika-s0403t:156_6: paṭikūlato pariggaṇhantassa uppannasaññā. Ukkaṇṭhitassāti nibbindantassa katthacipi
tika-s0403t:159_0: 66-70. Chaṭṭhe saha ājīvanti etthāti sājīvo, pañhassa pucchanaṃ vissajjanañca. Tenāha
tika-s0403t:159_1: “sājīvoti pañhapucchanañceva pañhavissajjanañcā”tiādi. Abhisaṅkhatanti citaṃ. Sattamādīni uttānatthāneva.
tika-s0403t:164_0: 71-72. Tatiyassa paṭhame avijjāpalighanti ettha avijjāti vaṭṭamūlikā avijjā, ayaṃ
tika-s0403t:164_2: ca “paligho viyāti paligho”ti vuccati. Tenesa tassā ukkhittattā “ukkhittapaligho”ti
tika-s0403t:164_3: vutto. Punabbhavassa karaṇasīlo, punabbhavaṃ vā phalaṃ arahatīti ponobhavikā, punabbhavadāyikāti
tika-s0403t:164_4: attho. Jātisaṃsāroti jāyanavasena ceva saṃsaraṇavasena ca evaṃladdhanāmānaṃ punabbhavakkhandhānaṃ
tika-s0403t:164_5: paccayo kammābhisaṅkhāro. Jātisaṃsāroti hi phalūpacārena kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Tañhi punappunaṃ
tika-s0403t:164_6: uppattikāraṇavasena parikkhipitvā ṭhitattā “parikhā”ti vuccati santānassa parikkhipanato.
tika-s0403t:164_7: Tenesa tassa saṃkiṇṇattā vikiṇṇattā sabbaso khittattā vināsitattā “saṃkiṇṇaparikho”ti vutto.
tika-s0403t:165_0: Taṇhāsaṅkhātanti ettha taṇhāti vaṭṭamūlikā taṇhā. Ayañhi gambhīrānugataṭṭhena “esikā”ti
tika-s0403t:165_1: vuccati. Luñcitvā uddharitvā. Orambhāgiyānīti orambhāgajanakāni kāmabhave upapattipaccayāni
tika-s0403t:165_2: kāmarāgasaṃyojanādīni. Etāni hi kavāṭaṃ viya nagaradvāraṃ cittaṃ pidahitvā ṭhitattā
tika-s0403t:165_3: “aggaḷā”ti vuccanti. Tenesa tesaṃ niggatattā bhinnattā “niraggaḷo”ti vuttoti. Aggamaggena
tika-s0403t:165_4: panno apacito mānaddhajo etassāti pannaddhajo. Pannabhāroti khandhabhārakilesabhāraabhisaṅkhārabhārā
tika-s0403t:165_5: oropitā assāti pannabhāro. Visaṃyuttoti catūhi yogehi sabbakilesehi ca visaṃyutto.
tika-s0403t:165_6: Asmimānoti rūpe asmīti māno, vedanāya, saññāya, saṅkhāresu, viññāṇe asmimāno. Ettha
tika-s0403t:165_7: hi pañcapi khandhe avisesato “asmī”ti gahetvā pavattamāno asmimānoti adhippeto.
tika-s0403t:166_0: Nagaradvārassa parissayapaṭibāhanatthañceva sodhanatthañca ubhosu passesu esikāthambhe
tika-s0403t:166_1: nikhaṇitvā ṭhapetīti āha “nagaradvāre ussāpite esikāthambhe”ti. Pākāraviddhaṃsaneneva
tika-s0403t:166_2: parikhābhūmisamakaraṇaṃ hotīti āha “pākāraṃ bhinditvā parikhaṃ vikiritvā”ti. “Eva”ntiādi
tika-s0403t:166_3: upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. Santo saṃvijjamāno kāyo dhammasamūhoti sakkāyo, upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ.
tika-s0403t:169_0: 73-74. Tatiye niyakajjhatteti attano santāne. Mettāya upasaṃharaṇavasena hitaṃ esantena.
tika-s0403t:169_1: Karuṇāya vasena anukampamānena. Pariggahetvāti parito gahetvā, pharitvāti attho.
tika-s0403t:169_2: Pariccāti parito katvā, samantato pharitvā icceva attho. “Paṭiccā”tipi pāṭho. Mā
tika-s0403t:169_3: pamajjitthāti “jhāyathā”ti vuttasamathavipassanānaṃ ananuyuñjanena aññena vā kenaci
tika-s0403t:169_4: pamādakāraṇena mā pamādaṃ āpajjittha. Niyyānikasāsane akattabbakaraṇaṃ viya kattabbākaraṇampi
tika-s0403t:169_5: pamādoti. Vipattikāleti sattaasappāyādivipattiyutte kāle. Sabbepi sāsane guṇā idheva
tika-s0403t:169_6: saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti āha “jhāyatha mā pamādattha…pe… anusāsanī”ti. Catutthe natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t:172_0: 75. Pañcame yujjhanaṃ yodho, so ājīvo etesanti yodhājīvā. Tenāha “yuddhūpajīvino”ti.
tika-s0403t:172_1: Santhambhitvā ṭhātuṃ na sakkotīti baddho dhitisampanno ṭhātuṃ na sakkoti. Samāgateti
tika-s0403t:173: Rajaggasminti paccatte bhummavacananti āha “kiṃ tassa puggalassa rajaggaṃ nāmā”ti. Vinibbeṭhetvāti gahitaggahaṇaṃ vissajjāpetvā. Mocetvāti sarīrato apanetvā.
tika-s0403t:176_0: 76. Chaṭṭhe cammanti iminā cammamayaṃ cammamiti sibbitaṃ, aññaṃ vā keṭakaphalakādiṃ
tika-s0403t:176_1: saṅgaṇhāti. Dhanukalāpaṃ sannayhitvāti dhanuñceva tūṇirañca sannayhitvā sajjetvā.
tika-s0403t:176_2: Dhanudaṇḍassa jiyāyattabhāvakaraṇādipi hi dhanuno sannayhanaṃ. Tenevāha “dhanuñca
tika-s0403t:176_3: sarakalāpañca sannayhitvā”ti. Yuddhasannivesena ṭhitanti dvinnaṃ senānaṃ byūhanasaṃvidhānanayena
tika-s0403t:176_4: kato yo sanniveso, tassa vasena ṭhitaṃ, senābyūhasaṃvidhānavasena sanniviṭṭhanti
tika-s0403t:176_5: vuttaṃ hoti. Ussāhañca vāyāmañca karotīti yujjhanavasena ussāhaṃ vāyāmañca karoti.
tika-s0403t:176_6: Pariyāpādentīti maraṇapariyantikaṃ aparaṃ pāpenti. Tenāha “pariyāpādayantī”ti, jīvitaṃ
tika-s0403t:177_0: Arakkhiteneva kāyenātiādīsu hatthapāde kīḷāpento gīvaṃ viparivattento kāyaṃ na rakkhati
tika-s0403t:177_1: nāma. Nānappakāraṃ duṭṭhullaṃ karonto vācaṃ na rakkhati nāma. Kāmavitakkādayo vitakkento
tika-s0403t:177_2: cittaṃ na rakkhati nāma. Anupaṭṭhitāya satiyāti kāyagatāya satiyā anupaṭṭhitāya.
tika-s0403t:177_3: Rāgena anugatoti rāgena anupahato. Rāgaparetoti vā rāgena phuṭṭho phuṭṭhavisena viya sappena.
tika-s0403t:178_0: Anudahanaṭṭhenāti anupāyappaṭipattiyā. Sampati āyatiñca mahābhitāpaṭṭhena. Anavatthitasabhāvatāya
tika-s0403t:178_3: adhikuṭṭanaṭṭhena. Avaṇe vaṇaṃ uppādetvā anto anupavisanasabhāvatāya vinivijjhanaṭṭhena.
tika-s0403t:181_0: 77-78. Sattame visesassa pattiyā visesassa pāpuṇanatthaṃ. Vīriyanti padhānavīriyaṃ.
tika-s0403t:181_1: Taṃ pana caṅkamanavasena karaṇe “kāyika”ntipi vattabbataṃ labhatīti āha – “duvidhampī”ti.
tika-s0403t:181_2: Satthakavātāti sandhibandhanāni kattariyā chindantā viya pavattavātā. Tenāha – “satthaṃ
tika-s0403t:181_3: viyā”tiādi. Katakammehīti katacorakammehi. Te kira katakammā yaṃ nesaṃ devataṃ āyācitvā
tika-s0403t:181_4: kammaṃ nipphannaṃ, tassa upakāratthāya manusse māretvā galalohitāni gaṇhanti. Te
tika-s0403t:181_5: “aññesu manussesu māriyamānesu kolāhalaṃ uppajjissati, pabbajitaṃ pariyesanto nāma
tika-s0403t:181_6: natthī”ti maññamānā bhikkhū gahetvā mārenti. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Akatakammehīti
tika-s0403t:181_7: aṭavito gāmaṃ āgamanakāle kammanipphattatthaṃ puretaraṃ balikammaṃ kātukāmehi. Tenevāha
tika-s0403t:181_8: – “corikaṃ katvā nikkhantā katakammā nāmā”tiādi. Aṭṭhame natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t:184_0: 79. Navame pāḷigambhīrāti pāḷivasena gambhīrā agādhā dukkhogāhā sallasuttasadisā.
tika-s0403t:184_2: Tathā hi tattha tā tā gāthā duviññeyyarūpā tiṭṭhanti. Duviññeyyañhi ñāṇena dukkhogāhanti
tika-s0403t:184_3: katvā “gambhīra”nti vuccati. Pubbāparaṃpettha kāsañci gāthānaṃ duviññeyyatāya dukkhogāhameva,
tika-s0403t:184_4: tasmā pāḷivasena gambhīraṃ. Atthagambhīrāti atthavasena gambhīrā mahāvedallasuttasadisā,
tika-s0403t:184_5: mahāvedallasuttassa atthavasena gambhīratā pākaṭāyeva. Lokaṃ uttaratīti lokuttaro,
tika-s0403t:184_6: so atthabhūto etesaṃ atthīti lokuttarā. Tenāha – “lokuttaradhammadīpakā”ti. Suññatāpaṭisaṃyuttāti
tika-s0403t:184_8: Uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbanti ca liṅgavacanavipallāsena vuttanti āha “uggahetabbe
tika-s0403t:184_9: ceva vaḷañjetabbe cā”ti. Kavino kammaṃ kavitā. Yassa pana yaṃ kammaṃ, taṃ tena katanti
tika-s0403t:184_10: vuccatīti āha “kavitāti kavīhi katā”ti. Kāveyyanti kabyaṃ, kabyanti ca kavinā vuttanti
tika-s0403t:184_11: attho. Tenāha “tasseva vevacana”nti. Cittakkharāti citrākāraakkharā. Itaraṃ tasseva
tika-s0403t:184_12: vevacanaṃ. Sāsanato bahiddhā ṭhitāti na sāsanāvacarā. Bāhirakasāvakehīti “buddhā”ti
tika-s0403t:184_13: appaññātānaṃ yesaṃ kesañci sāvakehi. Sussūsissantīti akkharacittatāya ceva sarasampattiyā
tika-s0403t:187_1: sambhogasaṃsaggo, kāyasaṃsaggo”ti evaṃ vuttena pañcavidhena saṃsaggena. Saṃsajjati
tika-s0403t:187_2: etenāti saṃsaggo, rāgo. Savanahetuko, savanavasena vā pavatto saṃsaggo savanasaṃsaggo.
tika-s0403t:187_3: Esa nayo sesesupi. Kāyasaṃsaggo pana kāyaparāmāso. Tesu parehi vā kathiyamānaṃ rūpādisampattiṃ
tika-s0403t:187_4: attanā vā sitalapitagītasaddaṃ suṇantassa sotaviññāṇavīthivasena uppanno rāgo savanasaṃsaggo
tika-s0403t:187_5: nāma. Visabhāgarūpaṃ olokentassa pana cakkhuviññāṇavīthivasena uppanno rāgo dassanasaṃsaggo
tika-s0403t:187_6: nāma. Aññamaññaālāpasallāpavasena uppannarāgo samullāpasaṃsaggo nāma. Bhikkhuno bhikkhuniyā
tika-s0403t:187_7: santakaṃ, bhikkhuniyā bhikkhussa santakaṃ gahetvā paribhogakaraṇavasena uppannarāgo
tika-s0403t:187_8: sambhogasaṃsaggo nāma. Hatthaggāhādivasena uppanno rāgo kāyasaṃsaggo nāma.
tika-s0403t:188_2: ettha kāra-saddassa kammatthataṃ dasseti. Yathā vā “ācayaṃ gāmino”ti vattabbe anunāsikalopena
tika-s0403t:188_3: “ācayagāmino”ti niddeso kato, evaṃ “sannidhikāraṃ paribhoga”nti vattabbe anunāsikalopena
tika-s0403t:189_0: “Sannidhikatassa paribhoga”nti ettha pana duvidhā kathā vinayavasena sallekhavasena
tika-s0403t:189_1: ca. Vinayavasena tāva yaṃ kiñci annaṃ ajja paṭiggahitaṃ aparajju sannidhikāraṃ hoti,
tika-s0403t:189_2: tassa paribhoge pācittiyaṃ. Attanā laddhaṃ pana sāmaṇerānaṃ datvā tehi laddhaṃ vā
tika-s0403t:189_3: pāpetvā dutiyadivase bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, sallekho pana na hoti. Pānasannidhimhipi
tika-s0403t:189_4: eseva nayo. Vatthasannidhimhi anadhiṭṭhitāvikappitaṃ sannidhi ca hoti, sallekhañca
tika-s0403t:189_5: kopeti. Ayaṃ nippariyāyakathā. Pariyāyato pana ticīvarasantuṭṭhena bhavitabbaṃ, catutthaṃ
tika-s0403t:189_6: labhitvā aññassa dātabbaṃ. Sace yassa kassaci dātuṃ na sakkoti, yassa pana dātukāmo
tika-s0403t:189_7: hoti, so uddesatthāya vā paripucchatthāya vā gato, āgatamatte dātabbaṃ, adātuṃ na
tika-s0403t:189_8: vaṭṭati. Cīvare pana appahonte, satiyā vā paccāsāya anuññātakālaṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-s0403t:189_9: Sūcisuttacīvarakārakānaṃ alābhe tatopi vinayakammaṃ katvā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati “imasmiṃ
tika-s0403t:189_10: jiṇṇe puna īdisaṃ kuto labhissāmī”ti pana ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati, sannidhi ca hoti, sallekhañca kopeti.
tika-s0403t:190_0: Yānasannidhimhi yānaṃ nāma vayhaṃ ratho sakaṭaṃ sandamānikā pāṭaṅkīti. Na panetaṃ
tika-s0403t:190_1: pabbajitassa yānaṃ, upāhanaṃ pana yānaṃ. Ekabhikkhussa hi eko araññavāsatthāya, eko
tika-s0403t:190_2: dhotapādakatthāyāti ukkaṃsato dve upāhanasaṅghāṭakā vaṭṭanti, tatiyaṃ labhitvā aññassa
tika-s0403t:190_3: dātabbo. “Imasmiṃ jiṇṇe aññaṃ kuto labhissāmī”ti ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati, sannidhi ca
tika-s0403t:190_4: hoti, sallekhañca kopeti. Sayanasannidhimhi sayananti mañco. Ekassa bhikkhuno eko
tika-s0403t:190_5: sayanagabbhe, eko divāṭṭhāneti ukkaṃsato dve mañcā vaṭṭanti. Tato uttariṃ labhitvā
tika-s0403t:190_6: aññassa bhikkhuno, gaṇassa vā dātabbo, adātuṃ na vaṭṭati, sannidhi ceva hoti, sallekho
tika-s0403t:190_7: ca kuppati. Gandhasannidhimhi bhikkhuno kaṇḍukacchuchavidosādiābādhe sati gandhā
tika-s0403t:190_8: vaṭṭanti. Gandhatthikena gandhañca āharāpetvā tasmiṃ roge vūpasante aññesaṃ vā ābādhikānaṃ
tika-s0403t:190_9: dātabbaṃ, dvāre pañcaṅguligharadhūpanādīsu vā upanetabbaṃ. “Puna roge sati bhavissatī”ti
tika-s0403t:190_10: ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati, gandhasannidhi ca hoti, sallekhañca kopeti.
tika-s0403t:191_0: Āmisanti vuttāvasesaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – idhekacco bhikkhu “tathārūpe kāle
tika-s0403t:191_2: āharāpetvā ṭhapeti. So vassakāle kālasseva sāmaṇerehi yāguṃ pacāpetvā paribhuñjitvā
tika-s0403t:191_3: “sāmaṇera udakakaddame dukkhaṃ gāmaṃ pavisituṃ, gaccha asukakulaṃ gantvā mayhaṃ vihāre
tika-s0403t:191_4: nisinnabhāvaṃ ārocehi, asukakulato dadhiādīni āharā”ti peseti. Bhikkhūhi “kiṃ, bhante,
tika-s0403t:191_5: gāmaṃ pavisissāmā”ti vuttepi “duppaveso, āvuso, idāni gāmo”ti vadati. Te “hotu, bhante,
tika-s0403t:191_6: acchatha tumhe, mayaṃ bhikkhaṃ pariyesitvā āharissāmā”ti gacchanti. Atha sāmaṇero
tika-s0403t:191_7: dadhiādīni āharitvā bhattañca byañjanañca sampādetvā upaneti, taṃ bhuñjantasseva
tika-s0403t:191_8: upaṭṭhākā bhattaṃ pahiṇanti, tatopi manāpamanāpaṃ bhuñjati. Atha bhikkhū piṇḍapātaṃ
tika-s0403t:191_9: gahetvā āgacchanti, tatopi manāpamanāpaṃ bhuñjatiyeva. Evaṃ catumāsampi vītināmeti.
tika-s0403t:191_10: Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhu muṇḍakuṭumbikajīvikaṃ jīvati, na samaṇajīvikanti. Evarūpo āmisasannidhi
tika-s0403t:191_11: nāma hoti. Bhikkhuno pana vasanaṭṭhāne ekā taṇḍulanāḷi eko guḷapiṇḍo kuḍuvamattaṃ
tika-s0403t:191_12: sappīti ettakaṃ nidhetuṃ vaṭṭati akāle sampattacorānaṃ atthāya. Te hi ettakaṃ āmisapaṭisanthāraṃ
tika-s0403t:191_13: alabhantā jīvitā voropeyyuṃ, tasmā sace hi ettakaṃ natthi, āharāpetvāpi ṭhapetuṃ
tika-s0403t:191_14: vaṭṭati. Aphāsukakāle ca yadettha kappiyaṃ, taṃ attanāpi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Kappiyakuṭiyaṃ
tika-s0403t:191_15: pana bahuṃ ṭhapentassapi sannidhi nāma natthi.
tika-s0403t:196_0: 81-82. Catutthassa paṭhamaṃ suviññeyyameva. Dutiye guṇamakkhanāya pavattopi attano
tika-s0403t:196_1: kārakaṃ gūthena paharantaṃ gūtho viya paṭhamataraṃ makkhetīti makkho, so etassa atthīti
tika-s0403t:196_2: makkhī. Paḷāsatīti paḷāso, parassa guṇe ḍaṃsitvā viya apanetīti attho. So etassa
tika-s0403t:196_3: atthīti paḷāsī. Paḷāsī puggalo hi dutiyassa dhuraṃ na deti, sampasāretvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0403t:199_1: tippabhedehi kuhanavatthūhi. Tividhena kuhanavatthunā lokaṃ kuhayati vimhāpayati
tika-s0403t:199_2: “aho acchariyapuriso”ti attani paresaṃ vimhayaṃ uppādetīti kuhako. Lābhasakkāratthiko
tika-s0403t:199_3: hutvā lapati attānaṃ dāyakaṃ vā ukkhipitvā yathā so kiñci dadāti, evaṃ ukkācetvā
tika-s0403t:199_4: kathetīti lapako. Nimittaṃ sīlaṃ tassāti nemittiko, nimittena vā carati, nimittaṃ
tika-s0403t:199_5: vā karotīti nemittiko. Nimittanti ca paresaṃ paccayadānasaññuppādakaṃ kāyavacīkammaṃ
tika-s0403t:199_6: vuccati. Nippeso sīlamassāti nippesiko. Nippisatīti vā nippeso, nippesoyeva nippesiko.
tika-s0403t:199_7: Nippesoti ca saṭhapuriso viya lābhasakkāratthaṃ akkosanuppaṇḍanaparapiṭṭhimaṃsikatādi.
tika-s0403t:202_0: 86-87. Chaṭṭhe paṭisambhidāsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Uccāvacānīti uccanīcāni.
tika-s0403t:202_1: Tenāha “mahantakhuddakānī”ti. Kiṃkaraṇīyānīti “kiṃ karomī”ti evaṃ vatvā kattabbakammāni.
tika-s0403t:202_2: Tattha uccakammāni nāma cīvarassa karaṇaṃ, rajanaṃ, cetiye sudhākammaṃ, uposathāgāracetiyagharabodhigharesu
tika-s0403t:202_3: kattabbakammanti evamādi. Avacakammaṃ nāma pādadhovanamakkhanādi khuddakakammaṃ.
tika-s0403t:202_4: Tatrupāyāsāti tatrupagamaniyā, tatra tatra mahante khuddake ca kamme sādhanavasena
tika-s0403t:202_5: upagacchantiyāti attho. Tassa tassa kammassa nipphādane samatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t:202_6: Tatrupāyāyāti vā tatra tatra kamme sādhetabbe upāyabhūtāya. Alaṃ kātunti kātuṃ samattho
tika-s0403t:202_7: hoti. Alaṃ saṃvidhātunti vicāretuṃ samattho. Sattamaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0403t:205_0: 88. Aṭṭhame thirabhāvappattoti sāsane thirabhāvaṃ anivattibhāvaṃ pattho. Pabbajito
tika-s0403t:205_1: hutvā bahū rattiyo jānātīti rattaññū. Tenāha “pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāyā”tiādi. Pākaṭoti
tika-s0403t:205_2: ayathābhūtaguṇehi ceva yathābhūtaguṇehi ca samuggato. Yaso etassa atthīti yasassī,
tika-s0403t:205_3: yasaṃ sito nissito vā yasassī. Tenāha “yasanissito”ti. Asataṃ asādhūnaṃ dhammā asaddhammā,
tika-s0403t:205_4: asantā vā asundarā gārayhā lāmakā dhammāti asaddhammā. Vipariyāyena saddhammā veditabbā.
tika-s0403t:208_0: 89. Navame āramitabbaṭṭhena kammaṃ ārāmo etassāti kammārāmo, tassa bhāvo kammārāmatā.
tika-s0403t:208_1: Tattha kammanti itikattabbaṃ kammaṃ vuccati. Seyyathidaṃ – cīvaravicāraṇaṃ cīvarakammakaraṇaṃ
tika-s0403t:208_3: karaṇanti. Ekacco hi etāni karonto sakaladivasaṃ etāneva karoti, taṃ sandhāyesa paṭikkhepo.
tika-s0403t:208_4: Yo pana etesaṃ karaṇavelāyameva tāni karoti, uddesavelāya uddesaṃ gaṇhāti, sajjhāyavelāya
tika-s0403t:208_5: sajjhāyati, cetiyaṅgaṇavattavelāya cetiyaṅgaṇavattaṃ karoti, manasikāravelāya manasikāraṃ
tika-s0403t:208_6: karoti, na so kammārāmo nāma. Bhassārāmatāti ettha yo itthivaṇṇapurisavaṇṇādivasena
tika-s0403t:208_7: ālāpasallāpaṃ karontoyeva divasañca rattiñca vītināmeti, evarūpo bhasse pariyantakārī
tika-s0403t:208_8: na hoti, ayaṃ bhassārāmo nāma. Yo pana rattimpi divasampi dhammaṃ katheti, pañhaṃ
tika-s0403t:208_9: vissajjeti, ayaṃ appabhasso bhasse pariyantakārīyeva. Kasmā? “Sannipatitānaṃ vo,
tika-s0403t:208_10: bhikkhave, dvayaṃ karaṇīyaṃ dhammī vā kathā, ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo”ti vuttattā.
tika-s0403t:209_0: Niddārāmatāti ettha yo gacchantopi nisinnopi nipannopi thinamiddhābhibhūto niddāyatiyeva,
tika-s0403t:209_1: ayaṃ niddārāmo nāma. Yassa pana karajakāye gelaññena cittaṃ bhavaṅge otarati, nāyaṃ
tika-s0403t:209_2: niddārāmo. Tenevāha – “abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, aggivessana, gimhānaṃ pacchime māse
tika-s0403t:209_3: pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvā dakkhiṇena passena
tika-s0403t:209_4: sato sampajāno niddaṃ okkamitā”ti. Saṅgaṇikārāmatāti ettha yo ekassa dutiyo, dvinnaṃ
tika-s0403t:209_5: tatiyo, tiṇṇaṃ catutthoti evaṃ saṃsaṭṭhova viharati, ekako assādaṃ na labhati, ayaṃ
tika-s0403t:209_6: saṅgaṇikārāmo. Yo pana catūsu iriyāpathesu ekakova assādaṃ labhati, nāyaṃ saṅgaṇikārāmo
tika-s0403t:212_0: 90. Dasame atipātovāti sabbarattiṃ niddāyitvā balavapaccūse koṭisammuñjaniyā thokaṃ
tika-s0403t:212_1: sammajjitvā mukhaṃ dhovitvā yāgubhikkhatthāya pātova pavisati. Taṃ atikkamitvāti
tika-s0403t:212_2: gihisaṃsaggavasena kālaṃ vītināmento majjhanhikasamayaṃ atikkamitvā pakkamati. Pātoyeva
tika-s0403t:212_3: hi gāmaṃ pavisitvā yāguṃ ādāya āsanasālaṃ gantvā pivitvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nipanno niddāyitvā
tika-s0403t:212_4: manussānaṃ bhojanavelāya “paṇītabhikkhaṃ labhissāmī”ti upakaṭṭhe majjhanhike uṭṭhāya
tika-s0403t:212_5: dhammakaraṇena udakaṃ gahetvā akkhīni puñchitvā piṇḍāya caritvā yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā
tika-s0403t:212_6: gihisaṃsaṭṭho kālaṃ vītināmetvā majjhanhe vītivatte paṭikkamati.
tika-s0403t:213_0: Appicchakathāti, “āvuso, atricchatā pāpicchatāti ime dhammā pahātabbā”ti tesu ādīnavaṃ
tika-s0403t:213_1: dassetvā “evarūpaṃ appicchataṃ samādāya vattitabba”ntiādinayappavattā kathā. Tīhi
tika-s0403t:213_2: vivekehīti kāyaviveko, cittaviveko, upadhivivekoti imehi tīhi vivekehi. Tattha eko
tika-s0403t:213_3: gacchati, eko tiṭṭhati, eko nisīdati, eko seyyaṃ kappeti, eko gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati,
tika-s0403t:213_4: eko paṭikkamati, eko caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhāti, eko carati, eko viharatīti ayaṃ kāyaviveko
tika-s0403t:213_5: nāma. Aṭṭha samāpattiyo pana cittaviveko nāma. Nibbānaṃ upadhiviveko nāma. Vuttampi
tika-s0403t:213_6: hetaṃ – “kāyaviveko ca vivekaṭṭhakāyānaṃ nekkhammābhiratānaṃ, cittaviveko ca parisuddhacittānaṃ
tika-s0403t:213_7: paramavodānappattānaṃ, upadhiviveko ca nirupadhīnaṃ puggalānaṃ visaṅkhāragatāna”nti.
tika-s0403t:213_8: Duvidhaṃ vīriyanti kāyikaṃ, cetasikañca vīriyaṃ. Sīlanti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ. Samādhinti
tika-s0403t:213_9: vipassanāpādakā aṭṭha samāpattiyo. Vimuttikathāti vā ariyaphalaṃ ārabbha pavattā
tika-s0403t:218_0: 91-100. Pañcamassa paṭhame dutiye ca natthi vattabbaṃ. Tatiye ājānanato aññā, uparimaggapaññā
tika-s0403t:218_1: heṭṭhimamaggena ñātapariññāya eva jānanato. Tassā pana phalabhāvato maggaphalapaññā
tika-s0403t:218_2: taṃsahagatā sammāsaṅkappādayo ca idha “aññā”ti vuttā. Aññāya byākaraṇāni aññābyākaraṇāni.
tika-s0403t:218_4: anadhigate adhigatasaññī hutvā adhigataṃ mayāti mānena. Catutthādīni uttānatthāneva.
tika-s0403t:225_0: 101-4. Tatiyassa paṭhame natthi vattabbaṃ. Dutiye piṇḍapātādiatthāya upasaṅkamituṃ
tika-s0403t:225_1: yuttaṭṭhānaṃ gocaro, vesiyā gocaro assāti vesiyāgocaro, mittasanthavavasena upasaṅkamitabbaṭṭhānanti
tika-s0403t:225_2: attho. Vesiyā nāma rūpūpajīviniyo, tā mittasanthavavasena na upasaṅkamitabbā samaṇabhāvassa
tika-s0403t:225_3: antarāyakarattā, parisuddhāsayassapi garahāhetuto, tasmā dakkhiṇādānavasena satiṃ
tika-s0403t:225_4: upaṭṭhapetvā upasaṅkamitabbaṃ. Vidhavā vuccanti matapatikā, pavutthapatikā vā. Thullakumāriyoti
tika-s0403t:225_5: mahallikā anividdhā kumāriyo. Paṇḍakāti napuṃsakā. Te hi ussannakilesā avūpasantapariḷāhā
tika-s0403t:225_6: lokāmisanissitakathābahulā, tasmā na upasaṅkamitabbā. Bhikkhuniyo nāma ussannabrahmacariyā.
tika-s0403t:225_7: Tathā bhikkhūpi. Aññamaññaṃ visabhāgavatthubhāvato santhavavasena upasaṅkamane katipāheneva
tika-s0403t:225_8: brahmacariyantarāyo siyā, tasmā na upasaṅkamitabbā, gilānapucchanādivasena upasaṅkamane
tika-s0403t:228_0: 105. Pañcame mettā etassa atthīti mettaṃ, taṃsamuṭṭhānaṃ kāyakammaṃ mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ.
tika-s0403t:228_1: Esa nayo sesadvayepi. Āvīti pakāsanaṃ. Pakāsabhāvo cettha yaṃ uddissa taṃ kāyakammaṃ
tika-s0403t:228_2: karīyati, tassa sammukhabhāvatoti āha “sammukhā”ti. Rahoti appakāsaṃ. Appakāsatā
tika-s0403t:228_3: ca yaṃ uddissa taṃ kāyakammaṃ karīyati, tassa apaccakkhabhāvatoti āha “parammukhā”ti.
tika-s0403t:228_4: Imāni mettakāyakammādīni bhikkhūnaṃ vasena āgatāni tesaṃ seṭṭhaparisabhāvato, gihīsupi
tika-s0403t:228_5: labbhantiyeva. Bhikkhūnañhi mettacittena ābhisamācārikapūraṇaṃ mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ
tika-s0403t:228_6: nāma. Gihīnaṃ cetiyavandanatthāya bodhivandanatthāya saṅghanimantanatthāya gamanaṃ
tika-s0403t:228_7: gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhe bhikkhū disvā paccuggamanaṃ pattappaṭiggahaṇaṃ āsanapaññāpanaṃ
tika-s0403t:228_8: anugamananti evamādikaṃ mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. Bhikkhūnaṃ mettacittena ācārapaññattisikkhāpanaṃ
tika-s0403t:228_9: kammaṭṭhānakathanaṃ dhammadesanā tepiṭakampi buddhavacanaṃ mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma.
tika-s0403t:228_10: Gihīnaṃ “cetiyavandanāya gacchāma, bodhivandanāya gacchāma, dhammassavanaṃ karissāma,
tika-s0403t:228_11: dīpamālaṃ pupphapūjaṃ karissāma, tīṇi sucaritāni samādāya vattissāma, salākabhattādīni
tika-s0403t:228_12: dassāma, vassāvāsikaṃ dassāma, ajja saṅghassa cattāro paccaye dassāma, saṅghaṃ nimantetvā
tika-s0403t:228_13: khādanīyādīni saṃvidahatha, āsanāni paññapetha, pānīyaṃ upaṭṭhapetha, saṅghaṃ paccuggantvā
tika-s0403t:228_14: ānetha, paññattāsane nisīdāpetha, chandajātā ussāhajātā veyyāvaccaṃ karothā”tiādikathanakāle
tika-s0403t:228_15: mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma. Bhikkhūnaṃ pātova uṭṭhāya sarīrappaṭijagganaṃ katvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ
tika-s0403t:228_16: gantvā vattādīni katvā vivittasenāsane nisīditvā “imasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhū sukhī hontu
tika-s0403t:228_17: averā abyāpajjā”ti cintanaṃ mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma, gihīnaṃ “ayyā sukhī hontu averā
tika-s0403t:229_0: Tattha navakānaṃ cīvarakammādīsu sahāyabhāvagamanaṃ sammukhā kāyakammaṃ nāma, therānaṃ
tika-s0403t:229_1: pana pādadhovanasiñcanabījanadānādibhedampi sabbaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ sammukhā kāyakammaṃ
tika-s0403t:229_2: nāma, ubhayehipi dunnikkhittānaṃ dārubhaṇḍādīnaṃ tesu avaññaṃ akatvā attanā dunnikkhittānaṃ
tika-s0403t:229_3: viya paṭisāmanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. “Devatthero tissatthero”ti vuttaṃ
tika-s0403t:229_4: evaṃ paggayhavacanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma, vihāre asantaṃ pana paṭipucchantassa
tika-s0403t:229_5: “kuhiṃ amhākaṃ devatthero, kuhiṃ amhākaṃ tissatthero, kadā nu kho āgamissatī”ti evaṃ
tika-s0403t:229_6: piyavacanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma. Mettāsinehasiniddhāni pana nayanāni
tika-s0403t:229_7: ummīletvā pasannena mukhena olokanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma, “devatthero
tika-s0403t:229_8: tissatthero arogo hotu abyāpajjo”ti samannāharaṇaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma.
tika-s0403t:229_9: Kāmañcettha mettāsinehasiniddhānaṃ nayanānaṃ ummīlanaṃ, pasannena mukhena olokanañca
tika-s0403t:229_10: mettaṃ kāyakammameva. Yassa pana cittassa vasena nayanānaṃ mettāsinehasiniddhatā,
tika-s0403t:229_11: mukhassa ca pasannatā, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāmā”ti. Samādhisaṃvattanappayojanāni
tika-s0403t:230_0: Samānasīlataṃ gatoti tesu tesu disābhāgesu viharantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ samānasīlataṃ
tika-s0403t:230_1: gato. Yāyanti yā ayaṃ mayhañceva tumhākañca paccakkhabhūtā. Diṭṭhīti sammādiṭṭhi.
tika-s0403t:230_2: Ariyāti niddosā. Niyyātīti vaṭṭadukkhato nissarati niggacchati. Sayaṃ niyyantīyeva
tika-s0403t:230_3: hi taṃsamaṅgipuggalaṃ vaṭṭadukkhato niyyāpetīti vuccati. Yā satthu anusiṭṭhi, taṃ
tika-s0403t:230_4: karotīti takkaro, tassa, yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjakassāti attho. Dukkhakkhayāyāti
tika-s0403t:233: 106-110. Chaṭṭhe adhisīleti nimittatthe bhummaṃ, sīlanimittaṃ na upavadati na nindatīti attho. Attani kamme ca anu anu pekkhati sīlenāti attānupekkhī. Sattamādīni uttānatthāneva.
tika-s0403t:238_0: 111-114. Dutiyassa paṭhame asanthavesu kulesu vissāso etassāti asanthavavissāsī.
tika-s0403t:238_1: Anissaro hutvā vikappeti saṃvidahati sīlenāti anissaravikappī. Vissaṭṭhāni visuṃ
tika-s0403t:238_2: khittāni bhedena avatthitāni kulāni ghaṭanatthāya upasevati sīlenāti vissaṭṭhupasevī.
tika-s0403t:241_0: 115-123. Pañcame āvāsamacchariyādīni pañca idha bhikkhuniyā vasena āgatāni, bhikkhussa
tika-s0403t:241_1: vasenapi tāni veditabbāni. Āvāsamacchariyena hi samannāgato bhikkhu āgantukaṃ disvā
tika-s0403t:241_2: “ettha cetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā parikkhāro ṭhapito”tiādīni vatvā saṅghikaāvāsaṃ
tika-s0403t:241_3: na deti. Kulamacchariyena samannāgato bhikkhu tehi tehi kāraṇehi ādīnavaṃ dassetvā
tika-s0403t:241_4: attano upaṭṭhāke kule aññesaṃ pavesampi nivāreti. Lābhamacchariyena samannāgato saṅghikampi
tika-s0403t:241_5: lābhaṃ maccharāyanto yathā aññe na labhanti, evaṃ karoti attanā visamanissitatāya
tika-s0403t:241_6: balavanissitatāya ca. Vaṇṇamacchariyena samannāgato attano vaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇeti, paresaṃ
tika-s0403t:241_7: vaṇṇe “kiṃ vaṇṇo eso”ti taṃ taṃ dosaṃ vadati. Vaṇṇoti cettha sarīravaṇṇopi, guṇavaṇṇopi veditabbo.
tika-s0403t:242_0: Dhammamacchariyena samannāgato – “imaṃ dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā eso maṃ abhibhavissatī”ti
tika-s0403t:242_1: aññassa na deti. Yo pana – “ayaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ uggahetvā aññathā atthaṃ viparivattetvā
tika-s0403t:242_2: nāsessatī”ti dhammanuggahena vā – “ayaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ uggahetvā uddhato unnaḷo avūpasantacitto
tika-s0403t:242_3: apuññaṃ pasavissatī”ti puggalānuggahena vā na deti, na taṃ macchariyaṃ. Dhammoti
tika-s0403t:242_4: cettha pariyattidhammo adhippeto. Paṭivedhadhammo hi ariyānaṃyeva hoti, te ca naṃ
tika-s0403t:242_5: na maccharāyanti macchariyassa sabbaso pahīnattāti tassa asambhavo eva. Tattha āvāsamacchariyena
tika-s0403t:242_6: lohagehe paccati, yakkho vā peto vā hutvā tasseva āvāsassa saṅkāraṃ sīsena ukkhipitvā
tika-s0403t:242_7: carati. Kulamacchariyena appabhogo hoti. Lābhamacchariyena gūthaniraye nibbattati,
tika-s0403t:242_8: saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā lābhaṃ maccharāyitvā puggalikaparibhogena vā paribhuñjitvā
tika-s0403t:242_9: yakkho vā peto vā mahāajagaro vā hutvā nibbattati. Vaṇṇamacchariyena bhavesu nibbattassa
tika-s0403t:242_10: vaṇṇo nāma na hoti. Dhammamacchariyena kukkuḷaniraye nibbattati. Chaṭṭhādīni uttānatthāneva.
tika-s0403t:249_0: 131. Catutthassa paṭhame atthaññūti hitaññū. Hitapariyāyo hettha attha-saddo “attattho
tika-s0403t:249_1: parattho”tiādīsu viya. Yasmā cesa paresaṃ hitaṃ jānanto te attani rañjeti, tasmā
tika-s0403t:249_2: vuttaṃ “rañjituṃ jānātī”ti. Daṇḍeti aparādhānurūpe daṇḍane. Balamhīti balakāye. Pañca
tika-s0403t:249_3: attheti attattho, parattho, ubhayattho, diṭṭhadhammiko attho, samparāyiko atthoti
tika-s0403t:249_4: evaṃ pañcappabhede atthe. Cattāro dhammeti catusaccadhamme, kāmarūpārūpalokuttarabhede
tika-s0403t:249_5: vā cattāro dhamme. Paṭiggahaṇaparibhogamattaññutāya eva pariyesanavissajjanamattaññutāpi
tika-s0403t:250_0: Uttarati atikkamati, abhibhavatīti vā uttaraṃ, natthi ettha uttaranti anuttaraṃ.
tika-s0403t:250_1: Anatisayaṃ, appaṭibhāgaṃ vā anekāsu devamanussaparisāsu anekasatakkhattuṃ tesaṃ ariyasaccappaṭivedhasampādanavasena
tika-s0403t:250_2: pavattā bhagavato dhammadesanā dhammacakkaṃ. Apica sabbapaṭhamaṃ aññātakoṇḍaññappamukhāya
tika-s0403t:250_3: aṭṭhārasaparisagaṇāya brahmakoṭiyā catusaccassa paṭivedhavidhāyinī yā dhammadesanā,
tika-s0403t:250_4: tassā sātisayā dhammacakkasamaññā. Tattha satipaṭṭhānātidhammo eva pavattanaṭṭhena
tika-s0403t:250_5: cakkanti dhammacakkaṃ. Cakkanti vā āṇā dhammato anapetattā, dhammañca taṃ cakkañcāti
tika-s0403t:250_6: dhammacakkaṃ. Dhammena ñāyena cakkantipi dhammacakkaṃ. Yathāha “dhammañca pavatteti
tika-s0403t:250_7: cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ, cakkañca pavatteti dhammañcāti dhammacakkaṃ, dhammena pavattetīti
tika-s0403t:250_8: dhammacakka”ntiādi. Appaṭivattiyanti dhammissarassa bhagavato sammāsambuddhassa dhammacakkassa
tika-s0403t:250_9: anuttarabhāvato appaṭisedhanīyaṃ. Kehi pana appaṭivattiyanti āha – “samaṇena vā”tiādi.
tika-s0403t:250_10: Tattha samaṇenāti pabbajjaṃ upagatena. Brāhmaṇenāti jātibrāhmaṇena. Sāsanaparamatthasamaṇabrāhmaṇānañhi
tika-s0403t:250_11: paṭilomacittaṃyeva natthi. Devenāti kāmāvacaradevena. Kenacīti yena kenaci avasiṭṭhapārisajjena.
tika-s0403t:250_12: Ettāvatā aṭṭhannampi parisānaṃ anavasesapariyādānaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Lokasminti sattaloke.
tika-s0403t:253_0: 132. Dutiye cakkavattivattanti dasavidhaṃ, dvādasavidhaṃ vā cakkavattibhāvāvahaṃ
tika-s0403t:253_1: vattaṃ. Tattha antojanasmiṃ balakāye dhammikāyeva rakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā saṃvidhānaṃ,
tika-s0403t:253_3: migapakkhīsu, adhammikapaṭikkhepo, adhanānaṃ dhanānuppadānaṃ, samaṇabrāhmaṇe upasaṅkamitvā
tika-s0403t:253_4: pañhapucchananti idaṃ dasavidhaṃ cakkavattivattaṃ. Idameva ca gahapatike pakkhijāte
tika-s0403t:253_5: ca visuṃ katvā gahaṇavasena dvādasavidhaṃ. Pitarā pavattitameva anuppavattetīti dasavidhaṃ
tika-s0403t:253_6: vā dvādasavidhaṃ vā cakkavattivattaṃ pūretvā nisinnassa puttassa aññaṃ pātubhavati,
tika-s0403t:253_7: so taṃ pavatteti. Ratanamayattā pana sadisaṭṭhena tadevetanti katvā “pitarā pavattita”nti
tika-s0403t:253_8: vuttaṃ. Yasmā vā so “appossukko, tvaṃ deva, hohi, ahamanusāsissāmī”ti āha. Tasmā
tika-s0403t:253_9: pitarā pavattitaṃ āṇācakkaṃ anuppavatteti nāmāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Yañhi
tika-s0403t:253_10: attano puññānubhāvasiddhaṃ cakkaratanaṃ, taṃ nippariyāyato tena pavattitaṃ nāma,
tika-s0403t:253_11: netaranti paṭhamanayo vutto. Yasmā pavattitasseva anuvattanaṃ, paṭhamanayo ca taṃsadise
tika-s0403t:253_12: tabbohāravasena vuttoti taṃ anādiyitvā dutiyanayo vutto.
tika-s0403t:256_0: 134. Catutthe “ubhato sujāto”ti ettake vutte yehi kehici dvīhi bhāgehi sujātatā paññāpeyya,
tika-s0403t:256_1: sujāta-saddo ca “sujāto cārudassano”tiādīsu ārohasampattipariyāyoti jātivasena sujātataṃ
tika-s0403t:256_2: vibhāvetuṃ “mātito ca pitito cā”ti vuttaṃ. Anorasaputtavasenapi loke mātupitusamaññā
tika-s0403t:256_3: dissati, idha pana sā orasaputtavasena icchitāti dassetuṃ “saṃsuddhaggahaṇiko”ti
tika-s0403t:256_4: vuttaṃ. Gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti dhāretīti gahaṇī, gabbhāsayasaññito mātukucchippadeso. Tenāha
tika-s0403t:256_6: gaṇhanato achaḍḍanato gahaṇī, tejodhātu. Pitā ca mātā ca pitaro. Pitūnaṃ pitaro pitāmahā.
tika-s0403t:256_7: Tesaṃ yugo pitāmahayugo, tasmā yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā, pitāmahadvandāti evamettha
tika-s0403t:256_8: attho daṭṭhabbo. Evañhi pitāmahaggahaṇeneva mātāmahopi gahitoti so aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0403t:256_9: visuṃ na uddhato. Yuga-saddo cettha ekasesanayena daṭṭhabbo “yugo ca yugo ca yugo”ti.
tika-s0403t:256_10: Evañhi tattha tattha dvinnaṃ gahitameva hoti. Tenāha “tato uddhaṃ sabbepi pubbapurisā
tika-s0403t:257_0: Akkhittoti appattakkhepo. Anavakkhittoti sampattavivādādīsu na avakkhitto na chaḍḍito.
tika-s0403t:257_1: Jātivādenāti hetumhi karaṇavacananti dassetuṃ “kena kāraṇenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ettha
tika-s0403t:257_2: ca “ubhato…pe… pitāmahayugā”ti etena khattiyassa yonidosābhāvo dassito saṃsuddhaggahaṇikabhāvakittanato.
tika-s0403t:257_3: “Akkhitto”ti iminā kiriyāparādhābhāvo. Kiriyāparādhena hi sattā khepaṃ pāpuṇanti.
tika-s0403t:257_4: “Anupakkuṭṭho”ti iminā ayuttasaṃsaggābhāvo. Ayuttasaṃsaggañhi paṭicca sattā akkosaṃ labhanti.
tika-s0403t:258_0: Aḍḍhatā nāma vibhavasampannatā, sā taṃ taṃ upādāyupādāya vuccatīti āha “yo koci attano
tika-s0403t:258_1: santakena vibhavena aḍḍho hotī”ti. Tathā mahaddhanatāpīti taṃ ukkaṃsagataṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0403t:258_2: “mahatā aparimāṇasaṅkhena dhanena samannāgato”ti vuttaṃ. Bhuñjitabbato paribhuñjitabbato
tika-s0403t:258_3: visesato kāmā bhogā nāmāti āha “pañcakāmaguṇavasenā”ti. Koṭṭhaṃ vuccati dhaññassa
tika-s0403t:258_4: āvasanaṭṭhānaṃ, koṭṭhabhūtaṃ agāraṃ koṭṭhāgāraṃ. Tenāha “dhaññena ca paripuṇṇakoṭṭhāgāro”ti.
tika-s0403t:258_5: Evaṃ sāragabbhaṃ koso, dhaññapariṭṭhapanaṭṭhānañca koṭṭhāgāranti dassetvā idāni tato
tika-s0403t:258_6: aññathā taṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yathā asino tikkhabhāvaparihārako
tika-s0403t:258_7: paṭicchado “koso”ti vuccati. Evaṃ rañño tikkhabhāvaparihāraṃ katvā caturaṅginī senā
tika-s0403t:258_8: kosoti āha “catubbidho koso hatthī assā rathā pattī”ti. Vatthakoṭṭhāgāraggahaṇeneva
tika-s0403t:259_0: Yassā paññāya vasena puriso “paṇḍito”ti vuccati, taṃ paṇḍiccanti āha “paṇḍiccena
tika-s0403t:259_1: samannāgato”ti. Taṃtaṃitikattabbatāsu chekabhāvo byattabhāvo veyyattiyaṃ. Sammohaṃ
tika-s0403t:259_2: hiṃsati vidhamatīti medhā, sā etassa atthīti medhāvī. Ṭhāne ṭhāne uppatti etissā
tika-s0403t:259_3: atthīti ṭhānuppatti, ṭhānaso uppajjanapaññā. Vaḍḍhiattheti vaḍḍhisaṅkhāte atthe.
tika-s0403t:262_0: 135-9. Pañcame hatthisminti hatthisippe. Hatthīti hi hatthivisayattā hatthisannissitattā
tika-s0403t:262_1: ca hatthisippaṃ gahitaṃ. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Vayatīti vayo, sobhanesu katthaci
tika-s0403t:262_2: apakkhalanto avitthāyanto tāni sandhāretuṃ sakkotīti attho. Na vayo avayo, tāni atthato
tika-s0403t:262_3: saddato ca sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti. Avayo na hotīti anavayo. Dve paṭisedhā pakatiṃ
tika-s0403t:265: 140. Dasame tibbānanti tikkhānaṃ. Kharānanti kakkasānaṃ. Kaṭukānanti dāruṇānaṃ. Asātānanti nasātānaṃ appiyānaṃ. Na tāsu mano appeti, na tā manaṃ appāyanti vaḍḍhentīti amanāpā.
tika-s0403t:270_0: 141. Pañcamassa paṭhame datvā avajānātīti ettha eko bhikkhu mahāpuñño catupaccayalābhī
tika-s0403t:270_1: hoti, so cīvarādīni labhitvā aññaṃ appapuññaṃ āpucchati. Sopi tasmiṃ punappunaṃ āpucchantepi
tika-s0403t:270_2: gaṇhātiyeva. Athassa itaro thokaṃ kupito hutvā maṅkubhāvaṃ uppādetukāmo vadati “ayaṃ
tika-s0403t:270_3: attano dhammatāya cīvarādīni na labhati, amhe nissāya labhatī”ti. Evampi datvā avajānāti
tika-s0403t:270_4: nāma. Eko pana ekena saddhiṃ dve tīṇi vassāni vasanto pubbe taṃ puggalaṃ garuṃ katvā
tika-s0403t:270_5: gacchante gacchante kāle cittīkāraṃ na karoti, āsananisinnaṭṭhānampi na gacchati.
tika-s0403t:270_6: Ayampi puggalo saṃvāsena avajānāti nāma. Ādheyyamukhoti ādito dheyyamukho, paṭhamavacanasmiṃyeva
tika-s0403t:270_7: ṭhapitamukhoti attho. Tatthāyaṃ nayo – eko puggalo sāruppaṃyeva bhikkhuṃ “asāruppo
tika-s0403t:270_8: eso”ti katheti. Taṃ sutvā esa niṭṭhaṃ gacchati, puna aññena sabhāgena bhikkhunā “sāruppo
tika-s0403t:270_9: aya”nti vuttepi tassa vacanaṃ na gaṇhāti. Asukena nāma “asāruppo aya”nti amhākaṃ
tika-s0403t:270_10: kathitanti purimabhikkhunova kathaṃ gaṇhāti. Aparopissa dussīlaṃ “sīlavā”ti katheti.
tika-s0403t:270_11: Tassa vacanaṃ saddahitvā puna aññena “asāruppo eso bhikkhu, nāyaṃ tumhākaṃ santikaṃ
tika-s0403t:270_12: upasaṅkamituṃ yutto”ti vuttepi tassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā purimaṃyeva kathaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-s0403t:270_13: Aparo vaṇṇampi kathitaṃ gaṇhāti, avaṇṇampi kathitaṃ gaṇhātiyeva. Ayampi ādheyyamukhoyeva
tika-s0403t:270_14: nāma ādhātabbamukho, yaṃ yaṃ suṇāti, tattha tattha ṭhapitamukhoti attho.
tika-s0403t:271_0: Loloti saddhādīnaṃ ittarakālappatitattā assaddhiyādīhi lulitabhāvena lolo. Ittarabhattītiādīsu
tika-s0403t:271_1: punappunaṃ bhajanena saddhāva bhattipemaṃ. Saddhāpemampi gehassitapemampi vaṭṭati,
tika-s0403t:271_2: pasādo saddhāpasādo. Evaṃ puggalo lolo hotīti evaṃ ittarasaddhāditāya puggalo lolo
tika-s0403t:271_3: nāma hoti. Haliddirāgo viya, thusarāsimhi koṭṭitakhānuko viya, assapiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍaṃ
tika-s0403t:271_4: viya ca anibaddhaṭṭhāne muhuttena kuppati. Mando momūhoti aññāṇabhāvena mando, avisayatāya
tika-s0403t:274_1: vattati. Tathā hesa “yaṃ kiñci dukkhaṃ sambhoti, sabbaṃ ārambhapaccayā”ti kamme āgato.
tika-s0403t:274_2: “Mahārambhā mahāyaññā, na te honti mahapphalā”ti kiriyāya. “Samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ uddissa
tika-s0403t:274_3: pāṇaṃ ārabhantī”ti hiṃsane. “Ārambhatha nikkhamatha, yuñjatha buddhasāsane”ti vīriye.
tika-s0403t:274_5: ca hotī”ti ayaṃ pana āpattivītikkame āgato, tasmā āpattivītikkamavasena ārabhati
tika-s0403t:274_6: ceva, tappaccayā ca vippaṭisārī hotīti ayamettha attho. Yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātīti
tika-s0403t:274_7: anadhigatattā yathāsabhāvato na jānāti. Yatthassāti yasmiṃ assa, yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā
tika-s0403t:274_8: etassa puggalassa uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantīti attho. Kiṃ
tika-s0403t:274_9: pana patvā te nirujjhantīti? Arahattamaggaṃ, phalappattassa pana niruddhā nāma honti.
tika-s0403t:274_10: Evaṃ santepi idha maggakiccavasena pana phalameva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t:275_0: Ārabhatī na vippaṭisārī hotīti āpattiṃ āpajjati, taṃ panesa desetuṃ sabhāgapuggalaṃ
tika-s0403t:275_1: pariyesati, tasmā na vippaṭisārī hoti. Na ārabhati vippaṭisārī hotīti āpattiṃ na
tika-s0403t:275_2: āpajjati, vinayapaññattiyaṃ pana akovidattā anāpattiyā āpattisaññī hutvā vippaṭisārī
tika-s0403t:275_3: hotīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. “Na ārabhati na vippaṭisārī hotī”ti yo vutto, kataro
tika-s0403t:275_4: so puggalo? Ossaṭṭhavīriyapuggalo. So hi “kiṃ me imasmiṃ kāle parinibbānena, anāgate
tika-s0403t:275_5: metteyyasammāsambuddhakāle parinibbāyissāmī”ti visuddhasīlopi paṭipattiṃ na pūreti.
tika-s0403t:275_6: So hi “kimatthaṃ āyasmā pamatto viharati, puthujjanassa nāma gati anibaddhā, tasmā
tika-s0403t:275_7: hi metteyyasammāsambuddhassa sammukhībhāvaṃ labheyyāsi, arahattatthāya vipassanaṃ
tika-s0403t:276_0: Sādhūti āyācanatthe nipāto. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yāva aparaddhaṃ vata āyasmatā, evaṃ
tika-s0403t:276_1: santepi mayaṃ āyasmantaṃ yācāma, desetabbayuttakassa desanāya, vuṭṭhātabbayuttakassa
tika-s0403t:276_2: vuṭṭhānena, āvikātabbayuttakassa āvikiriyāya ārambhaje āsave pahāya suddhante ṭhitabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena
tika-s0403t:276_3: vippaṭisāraje āsave paṭivinodetvā nīharitvā vipassanācittañceva vipassanāpaññañca
tika-s0403t:276_4: vaḍḍhetūti. Amunā pañcamena puggalenāti etena pañcamena khīṇāsavapuggalena. Samasamo
tika-s0403t:276_5: bhavissatīti lokuttaraguṇehi samabhāveneva samo bhavissatīti evaṃ khīṇāsavena ovaditabboti
tika-s0403t:279_0: 144-6. Catutthe paṭikūleti amanuññe aniṭṭhe. Appaṭikūlasaññīti iṭṭhākāreneva pavattacitto.
tika-s0403t:279_1: Iṭṭhasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ asubhāya vā pharati, aniccato vā upasaṃharati upaneti pavatteti.
tika-s0403t:279_2: Aniṭṭhasmiṃ vatthusminti aniṭṭhe sattasaññite ārammaṇe. Mettāya vā pharatīti mettaṃ
tika-s0403t:279_3: hitesitaṃ upasaṃharanto sabbatthakameva vā tattha pharati. Dhātuto vā upasaṃharatīti
tika-s0403t:279_4: dhammasabhāvacintanena dhātuto paccavekkhaṇāya dhātumanasikāraṃ vā tattha pavatteti.
tika-s0403t:279_5: Tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvāti sabhāvato ānubhāvato ca upatiṭṭhantaṃ ārammaṇe paṭikūlabhāvaṃ
tika-s0403t:279_6: appaṭikūlabhāvañcāti taṃ ubhayaṃ pahāya aggahetvā, sabbasmiṃ pana tasmiṃ majjhatto
tika-s0403t:279_7: hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Majjhatto hutvā viharitukāmo pana kiṃ karotīti? Iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu
tika-s0403t:279_8: āpāthaṃ gatesu neva somanassito hoti, na domanassito hoti. Upekkhako vihareyyāti
