tika-s0403t:952_7: hoti, yaṃ tathāgatassa paṭisandhigahaṇādīsu kampati. Āṇākkhettaṃ koṭisahassacakkavāḷapariyantaṃ,
tika-s0403t:952_8: yattha ratanasuttaṃ khandhaparittaṃ dhajaggaparittaṃ. Āṭānāṭiyaparittaṃ, moraparittanti
tika-s0403t:952_9: imesaṃ parittānaṃ ānubhāvo vattati. Visayakkhettaṃ anantamaparimāṇaṃ, yaṃ “yāvatā
tika-s0403t:952_10: vā pana ākaṅkheyyā”ti vuttaṃ. Evametesu tīsu buddhakkhettesu ekaṃ āṇākkhettaṃ vinassati.
tika-s0403t:952_11: Tasmiṃ pana vinassante jātikkhettaṃ vinaṭṭhameva hoti. Vinassantañca ekatova vinassati,
tika-s0403t:953_0: Tīṇi saṃvaṭṭamūlānīti rāgadosamohasaṅkhātāni tīṇi saṃvaṭṭakāraṇāni. Rāgādīsu hi akusalamūlesu
tika-s0403t:953_1: ussannesu loko vinassati. Tathā hi rāge ussannatare agginā vinassati, dose ussannatare
tika-s0403t:953_2: udakena, mohe ussannatare vātena. Keci pana “dose ussannatare agginā, rāge udakenā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0403t:954_0: Tīṇi kolāhalānīti kappakolāhalaṃ, buddhakolāhalaṃ, cakkavattikolāhalanti tīṇi kolāhalāni.
tika-s0403t:954_1: Tattha “vassasatasahassamatthake kappuṭṭhānaṃ nāma bhavissatī”tiādinā devatāhi ugghositasaddo
tika-s0403t:954_2: kappakolāhalaṃ nāma hoti. “Ito vassasatasahassamatthake loko vinassissati, mettaṃ,
tika-s0403t:954_3: mārisā, bhāvetha karuṇaṃ muditaṃ upekkha”nti manussapathe devatā ghosantiyo caranti.
tika-s0403t:954_4: “Vassasahassamatthake buddho uppajjissatī”ti buddhakolāhalaṃ nāma hoti. “Ito vassasahassamatthake
tika-s0403t:954_5: buddho uppajjitvā dhammānudhammappaṭipanno saṅgharatanena parivārito dhammaṃ desento
tika-s0403t:954_6: vicarissatī”ti devatā ugghosanti. “Vassasatamatthake pana cakkavattī uppajjissatī”ti
tika-s0403t:954_7: cakkavattikolāhalaṃ nāma hoti. “Ito vassasatamatthake sattaratanasampanno cātuddīpissaro
tika-s0403t:954_8: sahassaparivāro vehāsaṅgamo cakkavattī rājā uppajjissatī”ti devatā ugghosanti.
tika-s0403t:955: Aciraṭṭhena na dhuvāti udakabubbuḷādayo viya na ciraṭṭhāyitāya dhuvabhāvarahitā. Assāsarahitāti supinake pītapānīyaṃ viya anulittacandanaṃ viya ca assāsavirahitā.
tika-s0403t:956_0: Upakappanameghoti kappavināsakameghaṃ sandhāya vadati. Yasmiñhi samaye kappo agginā
tika-s0403t:956_1: nassati, āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷe ekamahāvassaṃ
tika-s0403t:956_2: vassati. Manussā tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā sabbabījāni nīharitvā vapanti. Sassesu pana gokhāyitakamattesu
tika-s0403t:956_3: jātesu gadrabharavaṃ ravanto ekabindumpi na vassati, tadā pacchinnaṃ pacchinnameva
tika-s0403t:956_4: vassaṃ hoti. Tenāha “tadā nikkhantabījaṃ..pe… ekabindumpi devo na vassatī”ti. “Vassasatasahassa
tika-s0403t:956_5: accayena kappavuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”tiādinā devatāhi vuttavacanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena
tika-s0403t:956_6: manussā ca bhummadevatā ca saṃvegajātā aññamaññaṃ muducittā hutvā mettādīni puññānī
tika-s0403t:956_7: katvā devaloke nibbattanti, avīcito paṭṭhāya tuccho hotīti.
tika-s0403t:957_0: Pañca bījajātānīti mūlabījaṃ khandhabījaṃ phaḷubījaṃ aggabījaṃ bījabījanti pañca
tika-s0403t:957_1: bījāni jātāni. Tattha mūlabījanti vacā, vacattaṃ, haliddaṃ, siṅgiveranti evamādi.
tika-s0403t:957_2: Khandhabījanti assattho, nigrodhoti evamādi. Phaḷubījanti ucchu, veḷu, naḷoti evamādi.
tika-s0403t:957_3: Aggabījanti ajjukaṃ, phaṇijjakanti evamādi. Bījabījanti vīhiādi pubbaṇṇañceva muggamāsādiaparaṇṇañca.
tika-s0403t:957_5: niruḷho bīja-saddo tadatthasiddhiyā mūlādīsupi kesuci pavattatīti mūlādito nivattanatthaṃ
tika-s0403t:957_6: ekena bīja-saddena visesetvā vuttaṃ “bījabīja”nti “rūparūpaṃ dukkhadukkha”nti yathā.
tika-s0403t:958: Yaṃ kadācītiādīsu yanti nipātamattaṃ. Kadācīti kismiñci kāle. Karahacīti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Dīghassa addhunoti dīghassa kālassa. Accayenāti atikkamena. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-s0403t:961_0: 67. Tatiye paccante bhavaṃ paccantimaṃ. “Ratho sīlaparikkhāro, jhānakkho cakkavīriyo”tiādīsu
tika-s0403t:961_1: viya alaṅkāravacano parikkhārasaddoti āha “nagarālaṅkārehi alaṅkata”nti. Parivāravacanopi
tika-s0403t:961_2: vaṭṭatiyeva “satta samādhiparikkhārā”tiādīsu viya. Nemaṃ vuccati thambhādīhi anupatabhūmippadesoti
tika-s0403t:961_3: āha “gambhīraāvāṭā”ti, gambhīraṃ bhūmiṃ anuppaviṭṭhāti attho. Suṭṭhu sannisīdāpitāti
tika-s0403t:962: Anupariyāyeti etenāti anupariyāyo, soyeva pathoti anupariyāyapatho, parito pākārassa anuyāyamaggo.
tika-s0403t:963_0: Hatthiṃ ārohanti ārohāpayanti cāti hatthārohā. Yena hi payogena puriso hatthino ārohanayoggo
tika-s0403t:963_1: hoti, hatthissa taṃ payogaṃ vidhāyantānaṃ sabbesampetesaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Tenāha “sabbepī”tiādi.
tika-s0403t:963_2: Tattha hatthācariyā nāma ye hatthino hatthārohakānañca sikkhāpakā. Hatthivejjā nāma
tika-s0403t:963_3: hatthibhisakkā. Hatthibandhā nāma hatthīnaṃ pādarakkhakā. Ādi-saddena hatthīnaṃ yavapadāyakādike
tika-s0403t:963_4: saṅgaṇhāti. Assārohā rathikāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Rathe niyuttā rathikā. Ratharakkhā
tika-s0403t:963_5: nāma rathassa āṇirakkhakā. Dhanuṃ gaṇhanti gaṇhāpenti cāti dhanuggahā, issāsā dhanusippassa
tika-s0403t:963_6: sikkhāpakā ca. Tenāha “dhanuācariyā issāsā”ti. Celena celapaṭākāya yuddhe akanti
tika-s0403t:963_7: gacchantīti celakāti āha – “ye yuddhe jayaddhajaṃ gahetvā purato gacchantī”ti. Yathā
tika-s0403t:963_8: tathā ṭhite senike brūhakaraṇavasena tato tato calayanti uccālentīti calakā. Sakuṇagghiādayo
tika-s0403t:963_9: viya maṃsapiṇḍaṃ parasenāsamūhaṃ sāhasikamahāyodhatāya chetvā chetvā dayanti uppatitvā
tika-s0403t:963_10: gacchantīti piṇḍadāyakā. Dutiyavikappe piṇḍe dayanti janasammadde uppatantā viya
tika-s0403t:963_11: gacchantīti piṇḍadāyakāti attho veditabbo. Uggatuggatāti thāmajavaparakkamādivasena
tika-s0403t:963_12: ativiya uggatā, udaggāti attho. Pakkhandantīti attano vīrasūrabhāvena asajjamānā
tika-s0403t:963_13: parasenaṃ anupavisantīti attho. Thāmajavabalaparakkamādisampattiyā mahānāgā viya
tika-s0403t:963_14: mahānāgā. Ekasūrāti ekākisūrā attano sūrabhāveneva ekākino hutvā yujjhanakā. Sajālikāti
tika-s0403t:963_15: savammikā. Saraparittāṇanti cammaparisibbitaṃ kheṭakaṃ, cammamayaṃ vā phalakaṃ. Gharadāsayodhāti attano dāsayodhā.
tika-s0403t:964_1: pasīditabbe vatthusmiṃ pasīdanalakkhaṇā. Okappanasaddhāti okkantitvā pakkhanditvā
tika-s0403t:964_2: adhimuccanaṃ. Pasādanīye vatthusmiṃ pasīdanaṃ pasādasaddhā. Ayaṃ anudhammoti ayaṃ
tika-s0403t:964_3: navannaṃ lokuttaradhammānaṃ anulomadhammo. Nibbidābahuloti ukkaṇṭhanābahulo. Saddhā
tika-s0403t:964_4: bandhati pātheyyanti saddhā nāmāyaṃ sattassa maraṇavasena mahāpathaṃ saṃvajato mahākantāraṃ
tika-s0403t:964_5: paṭipajjato mahāviduggaṃ pakkhandato pātheyyapuṭaṃ bandhati, sambalaṃ vissajjetīti
tika-s0403t:964_6: attho. Saddhañhi uppādetvā dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ rakkhati, uposathakammaṃ karoti. Tenetaṃ
tika-s0403t:964_7: vuttaṃ “saddhā bandhati pātheyya”nti. Sirīti issariyaṃ. Issariye hi abhimukhībhūte
tika-s0403t:964_8: thalatopi jalatopi bhogā āgacchantiyeva. Tenetaṃ vuttaṃ “sirī bhogānamāsayo”ti. Saddhā
tika-s0403t:964_9: dutiyā purisassa hotīti purisassa devaloke, manussaloke ceva nibbānañca gacchantassa
tika-s0403t:964_10: saddhā dutiyā hoti, sahāyakiccaṃ sādheti. Bhattapuṭādīti ādi-saddena dutiyikādīnaṃ
tika-s0403t:964_11: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Anekasarasatāti anekasabhāvatā, anekakiccatā vā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0403t:967_0: 68. Catutthe suttageyyādidhammaṃ jānātīti dhammaññū. Tassa tasseva suttageyyādinā
tika-s0403t:967_1: bhāsitassa tadaññassa suttapadatthassa bodhakassa saddassa atthakusalatāvasena atthaṃ
tika-s0403t:967_2: jānātīti atthaññū. “Ettakomhi sīlena samādhinā paññāyā”ti evaṃ yathā attano pamāṇajānanavasena
tika-s0403t:967_4: mattaññū. Niddese pana paṭiggahaṇamattaññutāya eva paribhogādimattaññutā pabodhitā
tika-s0403t:967_5: hotīti paṭiggahaṇamattaññutāva dassitā. “Ayaṃ kālo uddesassa, ayaṃ kālo paripucchāya,
tika-s0403t:967_6: ayaṃ kālo yogassa adhigamāyā”ti evaṃ kālaṃ jānātīti kālaññū. Tattha pañca vassāni
tika-s0403t:967_7: uddesassa kālo, dasa paripucchāya, idaṃ atisambādhaṃ, atikkhapaññassa tāvatā kālena
tika-s0403t:967_8: tīretuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā dasa vassāni uddesassa kālo, vīsati paripucchāya, tato paraṃ
tika-s0403t:967_9: yoge kammaṃ kātabbaṃ. Khattiyaparisādikaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ parisaṃ jānātīti parisaññū.
tika-s0403t:967_10: Bhikkhuparisādikaṃ catubbidhaṃ, khattiyaparisādikaṃ manussaparisaṃyeva puna catubbidhaṃ
tika-s0403t:967_11: gahetvā aṭṭhavidhaṃ vadanti apare. Niddese panassa khattiyaparisādicatubbidhaparisaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0403t:967_12: nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Imaṃ me sevantassa akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā
tika-s0403t:967_13: dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, tasmā ayaṃ puggalo sevitabbo, vipariyāyato añño asevitabbo”ti
tika-s0403t:967_14: sevitabbāsevitabbapuggalaṃ jānātīti puggalaparoparaññū. Evañhi tesaṃ puggalānaṃ paroparaṃ
tika-s0403t:967_15: ukkaṭṭhanihīnataṃ jānāti nāma. Niddesepissa sevitabbāsevitabbapuggale vibhāvanameva
tika-s0403t:970_0: 69-70. Pañcame patitapalāsoti patitapatto. Ettha paṭhamaṃ paṇḍupalāsataṃ, dutiyaṃ
tika-s0403t:970_1: pannapalāsatañca vatvā tatiyaṃ jālakajātatā, catutthaṃ khārakajātatā ca pāḷiyaṃ vuttā.
tika-s0403t:970_2: Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mahāgovindasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ imameva pāḷiṃ āharitvā dassentena
tika-s0403t:970_3: paṭhamaṃ paṇḍupalāsataṃ, dutiyaṃ pannapalāsatañca vatvā tatiyaṃ khārakajātatā, catutthaṃ
tika-s0403t:970_4: jālakajātatā ca dassitā. Evañhi tattha vuttaṃ – “pāricchattake pupphamāne ekaṃ vassaṃ
tika-s0403t:970_5: upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti, te tassa paṇḍupalāsabhāvato paṭṭhāya attamanā honti. Yathāha –
tika-s0403t:971_0: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ pāricchattako koviḷāro, paṇḍupalāso
tika-s0403t:971_1: hoti, attamanā, bhikkhave, devā tāvatiṃsā tasmiṃ samaye honti ‘paṇḍupalāso dāni pāricchattako,
tika-s0403t:971_2: koviḷāro, na cirasseva pannapalāso bhavissatī’ti. Yasmiṃ samaye devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ
tika-s0403t:971_3: pāricchattako, koviḷāro, pannapalāso hoti, jālakajāto hoti, khārakajāto hoti, kuṭumalakajāto
tika-s0403t:971_4: hoti, korakajāto hoti, attamanā, bhikkhave, devā tāvatiṃsā tasmiṃ samaye honti ‘korakajāto
tika-s0403t:971_5: dāni pāricchattako koviḷāro, na cirasseva sabbapāliphullo bhavissatī’ti.
tika-s0403t:972_0: Līnatthappakāsiniyampi ettha evamattho dassito – pannapalāsoti patitapatto. Khārakajātoti
tika-s0403t:972_1: jātakhuddakamakuḷo. Ye hi nīlapattakā ativiya khuddakā makuḷā, te “khārakā”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0403t:972_2: Jālakajātoti tehiyeva khuddakamakuḷehi jātajālako sabbaso jālo viya jāto. Keci pana
tika-s0403t:972_3: “jālakajātoti ekajālo viya jāto”ti atthaṃ vadanti. Pāricchattako kira khārakaggahaṇakāle
tika-s0403t:972_4: sabbatthakameva pallaviko hoti, te cassa pallavā pabhassarapavāḷavaṇṇasamujjalā honti.
tika-s0403t:972_5: Tena so sabbaso samujjalanto tiṭṭhati. Kuṭumalajātoti sañjātamahāmakuḷo. Korakajātoti
tika-s0403t:972_7: Ayañca anukkamo dīghabhāṇakānaṃ vaḷañjanānukkamena dassito, na ettha ācariyassa virodho āsaṅkitabbo.
tika-s0403t:973_0: Kantanakavātoti devānaṃ puññakammapaccayā pupphānaṃ chindanakavāto. Kantatīti chindati.
tika-s0403t:973_1: Sampaṭicchanakavātoti chinnānaṃ chinnānaṃ pupphānaṃ sampaṭiggaṇhakavāto. Cinantoti
tika-s0403t:973_3: apaññātadevatānaṃ. Reṇuvaṭṭīti reṇusaṅghāto. Kaṇṇikaṃ āhaccāti sudhammāya kūṭaṃ āhantvā.
tika-s0403t:974_0: Anupharaṇānubhāvoti khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno kittisaddassa yāva brahmalokā anupharaṇasaṅkhāto
tika-s0403t:974_1: ānubhāvo. Pabbajjānissitaṃ hotīti pabbajjāya catupārisuddhisīlampi dassitamevāti
tika-s0403t:974_2: adhippāyo. Paṭhamajjhānasannissitantiādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Idha
tika-s0403t:974_3: pana ubhayato paricchedo heṭṭhā sīlato upari arahattato ca paricchedassa dassitattā.
tika-s0403t:974_4: Tenetaṃ vuttanti tena kāraṇena etaṃ “catupārisuddhisīlaṃ pabbajjānissitaṃ hotī”tiādivacanaṃ
tika-s0403t:977_0: 71. Sattame atthassa asādhikā “bhāvanaṃ ananuyuttassā”ti vuttattā. Sambhāvanattheti
tika-s0403t:977_1: “api nāma evaṃ siyā”ti vikappanattho sambhāvanattho. Evañhi loke siliṭṭhavacanaṃ
tika-s0403t:977_2: hotīti ekameva saṅkhaṃ avatvā aparāya saṅkhāya saddhiṃ vacanaṃ loke siliṭṭhavacanaṃ
tika-s0403t:977_3: hoti yathā “dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitānī”ti. Sammā adhisayitānīti pādādīhi attanā
tika-s0403t:977_4: nesaṃ kiñci upaghātaṃ akarontiyā bahivātādiparissayapariharaṇatthaṃ sammadeva upari
tika-s0403t:977_5: sayitāni. Upariattho hettha adhi-saddo. Utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyāti tesaṃ allasinehapariyādānatthaṃ
tika-s0403t:977_6: attano kāyusmāvasena utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyā. Tenāha “usmīkatānī”ti. Sammā paribhāvitānīti
tika-s0403t:977_7: sammadeva sabbaso kukkuṭavāsanāya vāsitāni. Tenāha “kukkuṭagandhaṃ gāhāpitānī”ti.
tika-s0403t:977_9: ānubhāvanipphāditanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sammāadhisayaneneva hi itaradvayaṃ ijjhati. Na
tika-s0403t:977_10: hi sammāadhisayanato visuṃ sammāparisedanassa sammāparibhāvanassa ca kāraṇaṃ atthi.
tika-s0403t:977_11: Tena pana saddhiṃyeva itaresaṃ dvinnampi ijjhanato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t:978_1: aho vata me”tiādinā na icchā uppajjeyya kāraṇassa pana sampāditattā, atha kho bhabbāva
tika-s0403t:978_2: te abhinibbhijjitunti yojanā. Kasmā bhabbāti āha “te hi yasmā tāyā”tiādi. Sayampīti
tika-s0403t:978_3: aṇḍāni. Pariṇāmanti paripākaṃ bahinikkhamanayogyataṃ. Yathā kapālassa tanutā ālokassa
tika-s0403t:978_4: anto paññāyamānassa kāraṇaṃ, tathā kapālassa tanutāya nakhasikhāmukhatuṇḍakānaṃ kharatāya
tika-s0403t:978_5: ca allasinehapariyādānaṃ kāraṇavacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tasmāti ālokassa anto paññāyamānato
tika-s0403t:979_0: Opammasampaṭipādananti opammatthassa upameyyena sammadeva paṭipādanaṃ. Tanti opammasampaṭipādanaṃ.
tika-s0403t:979_1: Evanti idāni vuccamānākārena. Atthenāti upameyyatthena saṃsandetvā saha yojetvā.
tika-s0403t:979_2: Sampādanena sampayuttadhammavasena ñāṇassa tikkhabhāvo veditabbo. Ñāṇassa hi sabhāvato
tika-s0403t:979_3: satinepakkato ca tikkhabhāvo, samādhivasena kharabhāvo, saddhāvasena vippasannabhāvo.
tika-s0403t:979_5: hi vipassanā gahitagabbhā nāma tadā maggagabbhassa gahitattā. Tajjātikanti tassa
tika-s0403t:979_6: vipassanānuyogassa anurūpaṃ. Satthāpi avijjaṇḍakosaṃ paharati, desanāpi vineyyasantānagataṃ
tika-s0403t:979_7: avijjaṇḍakosaṃ paharati, yathāṭhāne ṭhātuṃ na deti.
tika-s0403t:980_0: Olambakasaṅkhātanti olambakasuttasaṅkhātaṃ. “Pala”nti hi tassa suttassa nāmaṃ. Cāretvā
tika-s0403t:980_1: dāruno heṭṭhā dosajānanatthaṃ ussāpetvā. Gaṇḍaṃ haratīti palagaṇḍoti etena “palena
tika-s0403t:980_2: gaṇḍahāro palagaṇḍoti pacchimapade uttarapadalopena niddeso”ti dasseti. Gahaṇaṭṭhāneti
tika-s0403t:980_3: hatthena gahetabbaṭṭhāne. Sammadeva khipīyanti etena kāyaduccaritādīnīti saṅkhepo,
tika-s0403t:980_4: pabbajjāva saṅkhepo pabbajjāsaṅkhepo. Tena vipassanaṃ anuyuñjantassa puggalassa ajānantasseva
tika-s0403t:981_0: Hemantikena kāraṇabhūtena, bhummatthe vā etaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ, hemantiketi attho. Paṭippassambhantīti
tika-s0403t:981_1: paṭippassaddhaphalāni honti. Tenāha “pūtikāni bhavantī”ti. Mahāsamuddo viya sāsanaṃ
tika-s0403t:981_2: agādhagambhīrabhāvato. Nāvā viya yogāvacaro mahoghuttarato. Pariyāyanaṃ viyāti parito
tika-s0403t:981_3: aparāparaṃ yāyanaṃ viya. Khajjamānānanti khādantena viya udakena khepiyamānabandhanānaṃ.
tika-s0403t:981_6: okkhāyamāne, paṭisaṅkhānupassanāya vā okkhāyamāne. Saṅkhārupekkhāya pakkhāyamāne.
tika-s0403t:981_7: Dubbalatā dīpitā “appakasireneva saṃyojanāni paṭippassambhanti, pūtikāni bhavantī”ti vuttattā.
tika-s0403t:984_0: 72-73. Aṭṭhame passatha nūti api passatha. Mahantanti vipulaṃ. Aggikkhandhanti aggisamūhaṃ.
tika-s0403t:984_1: Ādittanti padittaṃ. Sampajjalitanti samantato pajjalitaṃ accivipphuliṅgāni muñcantaṃ.
tika-s0403t:984_2: Sajotibhūtanti samantato uṭṭhitāhi jālāhi ekappabhāsamudayabhūtaṃ. Taṃ kiṃ maññathāti
tika-s0403t:984_3: taṃ idāni mayā vuccamānatthaṃ kiṃ maññathāti anumatiggahaṇatthaṃ pucchati. Yadettha
tika-s0403t:984_4: satthā aggikkhandhāliṅganaṃ kaññāliṅganañca ānesi, tamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “ārocayāmī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0403t:985_0: Dussīlassāti nissīlassa sīlavirahitassa. Pāpadhammassāti dussīlattā eva hīnajjhāsayatāya
tika-s0403t:985_1: lāmakasabhāvassa. Asucisaṅkassarasamācārassāti aparisuddhatāya asuci hutvā saṅkāya
tika-s0403t:985_2: saritabbasamācārassa. Dussīlo hi kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā “idaṃ asukena kataṃ bhavissatī”ti
tika-s0403t:985_3: paresaṃ āsaṅkā hoti. Kenacideva karaṇīyena mantayante bhikkhū disvā “kacci nu kho
tika-s0403t:985_4: ime mayā katakammaṃ jānitvā mantentī”ti attanoyeva saṅkāya saritabbasamācāro. Paṭicchannakammantassāti
tika-s0403t:985_5: lajjitabbatāya paṭicchādetabbakammantassa. Assamaṇassāti na samaṇassa. Salākaggahaṇādīsu
tika-s0403t:985_7: Uposathādīsu “ahampi brahmacārī”ti micchāpaṭiññāya brahmacāripaṭiññassa. Pūtinā kammena
tika-s0403t:985_8: sīlavipattiyā anto anupaviṭṭhattā antopūtikassa. Chadvārehi rāgādikilesānussavanena
tika-s0403t:985_9: tintattā avassutassa. Sañjātarāgādikacavarattā sīlavantehi chaḍḍetabbattā ca kasambujātassa.
tika-s0403t:986_0: Vālarajjuyāti vālehi katarajjuyā. Sā hi kharatarā hoti. Ghaṃseyyāti mathanavasena
tika-s0403t:986_1: ghaṃseyya. Teladhotāyāti telena nisitāya. Paccorasminti patiurasmiṃ, abhimukhe uramajjheti
tika-s0403t:986_2: adhippāyo. Ayosaṅkunāti saṇḍāsena. Pheṇuddehakanti pheṇaṃ uddehetvā uddehetvā, anekavāraṃ
tika-s0403t:986_3: pheṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetvāti attho. Evamettha saṅkhepato pāḷivaṇṇanā veditabbā. Navamaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0403t:989_0: 74. Dasame parittanti ittaraṃ. Tenāha “appaṃ thoka”nti. Pabandhānupacchedassa paccayabhāvo
tika-s0403t:989_1: idha jīvitassa raso kiccanti adhippetanti āha “sarasaparittatāyapī”ti. Tadadhīnavuttitāyapi
tika-s0403t:989_2: hi “yo, bhikkhave, ciraṃ jīvati, so vassasataṃ appaṃ vā bhiyyo”ti vacanato parittaṃ
tika-s0403t:989_3: khaṇaparittatāyapi. Paramatthato hi atiparitto sattānaṃ jīvitakkhaṇo ekacittakkhaṇappavattimattoyeva.
tika-s0403t:989_4: Yathā nāma rathacakkaṃ pavattamānampi ekeneva nemippadesena pavattati, tiṭṭhamānampi
tika-s0403t:989_5: ekeneva tiṭṭhati, evamevaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ tasmiṃ citte niruddhamatte
tika-s0403t:989_6: satto niruddhoti vuccati. Yathāha “atīte cittakkhaṇe jīvittha na jīvati na jīvissati.
tika-s0403t:989_7: Anāgate cittakkhaṇe na jīvittha na jīvati jīvissati. Paccuppanne cittakkhaṇe na jīvittha
tika-s0403t:996_0: Lahusanti lahukaṃ. Tenāha “lahuṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhanato lahusa”nti. Parittaṃ lahusanti
tika-s0403t:996_1: ubhayaṃ panetaṃ appakassa vevacanaṃ. Yañhi appakaṃ, taṃ parittañceva lahukañca hoti.
tika-s0403t:996_2: Idha pana āyuno adhippetattā rassanti vuttaṃ hoti. Mantāyanti karaṇatthe etaṃ bhummavacananti
tika-s0403t:996_3: āha “mantāya boddhabbaṃ, paññāya jānitabbanti attho”ti. Mantāyanti vā manteyyanti
tika-s0403t:996_4: vuttaṃ hoti, mantetabbaṃ mantāya upaparikkhitabbanti attho. Paññāya jānitabbanti
tika-s0403t:996_5: jānitabbaṃ jīvitassa parittabhāvo bahudukkhādibhāvo. Jānitvā ca pana sabbapalibodhe
tika-s0403t:996_6: chinditvā kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ, caritabbaṃ brahmacariyaṃ. Yasmā itthi jātassa amaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0403t:996_7: appaṃ vā bhiyyo vassasatato upari appaṃ aññaṃ vassasataṃ appatvā vīsaṃ vā tiṃsaṃ
tika-s0403t:996_8: vā cattālīsaṃ vā paṇṇāsaṃ vā saṭṭhi vā vassāni jīvati, evaṃdīghāyuko pana atidullabho.
tika-s0403t:996_9: “Asuko hi evaṃ ciraṃ jīvatī”ti tattha tattha gantvā daṭṭhabbo hoti. Tattha visākhā
tika-s0403t:996_10: upāsikā vīsasataṃ jīvati, tathā pokkharasātibrāhmaṇo, brahmāyubrāhmaṇo, bāvariyabrāhmaṇo,
tika-s0403t:996_11: ānandatthero, mahākassapattheroti. Anuruddhatthero pana vassasatañceva paṇṇāsañca
tika-s0403t:996_12: vassāni. Bākulatthero vassasatañceva saṭṭhi ca vassāni, ayaṃ sabbadīghāyuko, sopi
tika-s0403t:1001_0: 75-82. Aṭṭhamassa paṭhamaṃ dutiyañca uttānatthameva. Tatiye vinayalakkhaṇe patiṭṭhito
tika-s0403t:1001_1: lajjibhāvena vinayalakkhaṇe ṭhito hoti. Alajjī hi bahussutopi samāno lābhagarukatāya
tika-s0403t:1001_2: tantiṃ visaṃvādetvā uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ dīpetvā sāsane mahantaṃ upaddavaṃ
tika-s0403t:1001_3: karoti, saṅghabhedampi saṅgharājimpi uppādeti. Lajjī pana kukkuccako sikkhākāmo jīvitahetupi
tika-s0403t:1001_4: tantiṃ avisaṃvādetvā dhammameva vinayameva ca dīpeti, satthusāsanaṃ garuṃ katvā ṭhapeti.
tika-s0403t:1001_5: Evaṃ yo lajjī, so vinayaṃ ajahanto avokkamantova lajjibhāvena vinayalakkhaṇe ṭhito hoti patiṭṭhito.
tika-s0403t:1002_0: Asaṃhīroti ettha saṃhīro nāma yo pāḷiyaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vā heṭṭhā vā uparito vā
tika-s0403t:1002_1: padapaṭipāṭiyā vā pucchiyamāno vitthunati vipphandati, saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkoti, yaṃ
tika-s0403t:1002_2: yaṃ parena vuccati, taṃ taṃ anujānāti, sakavādaṃ chaḍḍetvā paravādaṃ gaṇhāti. Yo
tika-s0403t:1002_3: pana pāḷiyaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vā heṭṭhupariyavasena vā padapaṭipāṭiyā vā pucchiyamāno
tika-s0403t:1002_4: na vitthunati na vipphandati, ekekalomaṃ saṇḍāsena gaṇhanto viya “evaṃ mayaṃ vadāma,
tika-s0403t:1002_5: evaṃ no ācariyā vadantī”ti vissajjeti. Yamhi pāḷi ca pāḷivinicchayo ca suvaṇṇabhājane
tika-s0403t:1002_6: pakkhittasīhavasā viya parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ agacchanto tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ vuccati
tika-s0403t:1002_7: asaṃhīro. Yasmā pana evarūpo yaṃ yaṃ parena vuccati, taṃ taṃ nānujānāti, attanā suvinicchinitaṃ
tika-s0403t:1002_8: katvā gahitaṃ aviparītamatthaṃ na vissajjeti, tasmā vuttaṃ “na sakkoti gahitaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0403t:1005_0: 83. Navame vivekaṭṭhoti vivitto. Tenāha “dūrībhūto”ti. Satiavippavāse ṭhitoti kammaṭṭhāne
tika-s0403t:1005_1: satiṃ avijahitvā ṭhito. Pesitattoti kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya nibbānaṃ pesitacitto
tika-s0403t:1008_0: 84. Dasame adhikarīyanti etthāti adhikaraṇāni. Ke adhikarīyanti? Samathā. Kathaṃ
tika-s0403t:1008_1: adhikarīyanti? Samanavasena. Tasmā te tesaṃ samanavasena pavattantīti āha “adhikaraṇāni
tika-s0403t:1008_2: samentī”tiādi. Uppannānaṃ uppanānanti uṭṭhitānaṃ uṭṭhitānaṃ. Samathatthanti samanatthaṃ.
tika-s0403t:1008_3: Dīghanikāye saṅgītisuttavaṇṇanāyampi vitthāratoyevāti etthāyaṃ vitthāranayo – adhikaraṇesu
tika-s0403t:1008_4: tāva dhammoti vā adhammoti vā aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi vivadantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yo vivādo,
tika-s0403t:1008_5: idaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ nāma. Sīlavipattiyā vā ācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattiyā vā anuvadantānaṃ
tika-s0403t:1008_6: yo anuvādo upavadanā ceva codanā ca, idaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ nāma. Mātikāyaṃ āgatā
tika-s0403t:1008_7: pañca, vibhaṅge dveti sattapi āpattikkhandhā, idaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ nāma. Yaṃ saṅghassa
tika-s0403t:1008_8: apalokanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ karaṇaṃ, idaṃ kiccādhikaraṇaṃ nāma.
tika-s0403t:1009_0: Tattha vivādādhikaraṇaṃ dvīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya
tika-s0403t:1009_1: ca. Sammukhāvinayeneva sammamānaṃ yasmiṃ vihāre uppannaṃ tasmiṃyeva vā, aññatra vūpasametuṃ
tika-s0403t:1009_2: gacchantānaṃ antarāmagge vā, yattha gantvā saṅghassa niyyātitaṃ, tattha saṅghena
tika-s0403t:1009_3: vā, saṅghe vūpasametuṃ asakkonte tattheva ubbāhikāya sammatapuggalehi vā vinicchitaṃ
tika-s0403t:1009_4: sammati. Evaṃ sammamāne ca panetasmiṃ yā saṅghasammukhato dhammasammukhato vinayasammukhatā
tika-s0403t:1009_5: puggalasammukhatā, ayaṃ sammukhāvinayo nāma. Tattha ca kārakasaṅghassa saṅghasāmaggivasena
tika-s0403t:1009_6: sammukhibhāvo saṅghasammukhatā. Sametabbassa vatthuno bhūtattā dhammasammukhatā.
tika-s0403t:1009_7: Yathā taṃ sametabbaṃ, tathevassa samanaṃ vinayasammukhatā. Yo ca vivadati, yena ca
tika-s0403t:1009_8: vivadati, tesaṃ ubhinnaṃ atthapaccatthikānaṃ sammukhībhāvo puggalasammukhatā. Ubbāhikāya
tika-s0403t:1009_9: vūpasame panettha saṅghasammukhatā parihāyati. Evaṃ tāva sammukhāvinayeneva sammati.
tika-s0403t:1010_0: Sace panevampi na sammati, atha naṃ ubbāhikāya sammatā bhikkhū “na mayaṃ sakkoma
tika-s0403t:1010_1: vūpasametu”nti saṅghasseva niyyātenti. Tato saṅgho pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-s0403t:1010_2: salākaggāhāpakaṃ sammannati, tena guḷhakavivaṭakasakaṇṇajappakesu tīsu salākaggāhakesu
tika-s0403t:1010_3: aññataravasena salākaṃ gāhāpetvā sannipatitāya parisāya dhammavādīnaṃ yebhuyyatāya
tika-s0403t:1010_4: yathā te dhammavādino vadanti, evaṃ vūpasantaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya
tika-s0403t:1010_5: ca vūpasantaṃ hoti. Tattha sammukhāvinayo vuttanayo eva. Yaṃ pana yebhuyyasikākammassa
tika-s0403t:1010_6: karaṇaṃ, ayaṃ yebhuyyasikā nāma. Evaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ dvīhi samathehi sammati.
tika-s0403t:1011_0: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catūhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena
tika-s0403t:1011_1: ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca. Sammukhāvinayeneva sammamānaṃ yo ca anuvadati, yañca anuvadati,
tika-s0403t:1011_2: tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā sace kāci āpatti natthi, ubho khamāpetvā, sace atthi ayaṃ nāmettha
tika-s0403t:1011_3: āpattīti evaṃ vinicchitaṃ vūpasammati. Tattha sammukhāvinayalakkhaṇaṃ vuttanayameva.
tika-s0403t:1012_0: Yadā pana khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsitassa sativinayaṃ
tika-s0403t:1012_1: yācamānassa saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena sativinayaṃ deti, tadā sammukhāvinayena
tika-s0403t:1012_2: ca sativinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti. Dinne pana sativinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci
tika-s0403t:1012_3: anuvādo na ruhati. Yadā ummattako bhikkhu ummādavasena kate assāmaṇake ajjhācāre
tika-s0403t:1012_4: “saratāyasmā evarūpiṃ āpatti”nti bhikkhūhi codiyamāno “ummattakena me, āvuso, etaṃ
tika-s0403t:1012_5: kataṃ, nāhaṃ taṃ sarāmī”ti bhaṇantopi bhikkhūhi codiyamānova puna acodanatthāya amūḷhavinayaṃ
tika-s0403t:1012_6: yācati, saṅgho cassa ñatticatutthena kammena amūḷhavinayaṃ deti. Tadā sammukhāvinayena
tika-s0403t:1012_7: ca amūḷhavinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti. Dinne pana amūḷhavinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale
tika-s0403t:1012_8: kassaci tappaccayā anuvādo na ruhati. Yadā pana pārājikena vā pārājikasāmantena vā
tika-s0403t:1012_9: codiyamānassa aññenaññaṃ paṭicarato pāpussannatāya pāpiyassa puggalassa “sacāyaṃ
tika-s0403t:1012_10: acchinnamūlo bhavissati, sammā vattitvā osāraṇaṃ labhissati. Sace chinnamūlo, ayamevassa
tika-s0403t:1012_11: nāsanā bhavissatī”ti maññamāno saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena tassapāpiyasikaṃ karoti,
tika-s0403t:1012_12: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca vūpasantaṃ hotīti. Evaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ
tika-s0403t:1013_0: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ tīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca
tika-s0403t:1013_1: tiṇavatthārakena ca. Tassa sammukhāvinayeneva vūpasamo natthi. Yadā pana ekassa vā
tika-s0403t:1013_2: bhikkhuno santike saṅghagaṇamajjhesu vā bhikkhu lahukaṃ āpattiṃ deseti, tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ
tika-s0403t:1013_3: sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca vūpasammati. Tattha sammukhāvinaye tāva
tika-s0403t:1013_4: yo ca deseti, yassa ca deseti, tesaṃ sammukhībhāvo puggalasammukhato. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
tika-s0403t:1014_0: Puggalassa ca gaṇassa ca desanākāle saṅghasammukhato parihāyati. Yaṃ panettha “ahaṃ,
tika-s0403t:1014_1: bhante, itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno”ti ca “passasī”ti ca “āma, passāmī”ti ca paṭiññātāya
tika-s0403t:1014_2: “āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsī”ti karaṇaṃ, taṃ paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ nāma. Saṅghādisese parivāsādiyācanā
tika-s0403t:1015_0: Dvepakkhajātā pana bhaṇḍanakārakā bhikkhū bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhācāraṃ caritvā puna
tika-s0403t:1015_1: lajjidhamme uppanne “sace mayaṃ imāhi āpattīhi aññamaññaṃ kāressāma, siyāpi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
tika-s0403t:1015_2: kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya saṃvatteyyā”ti aññamaññaṃ āpattiyā kārāpane dosaṃ disvā yadā
tika-s0403t:1015_3: bhikkhū tiṇavatthārakakammaṃ karonti, tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena
tika-s0403t:1015_4: ca sammati. Tatra hi yattakā hatthapāsūpagatā “na metaṃ khamatī”ti evaṃ diṭṭhāvikammaṃ
tika-s0403t:1015_5: akatvā “dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabbaṃ kamma”nti na ukkoṭenti, niddampi okkantā honti,
tika-s0403t:1015_6: sabbesaṃ ṭhapetvā thullavajjañca gihipaṭisaṃyuttañca sabbāpattiyo vuṭṭhahanti. Evaṃ
tika-s0403t:1016_0: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ ekena samathena sammati sammukhāvinayeneva. Iti imāni cattāri adhikaraṇāni
tika-s0403t:1016_1: yathānurūpaṃ imehi sattahi samathehi sammanti. Tena vuttaṃ – “uppannuppannānaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ
tika-s0403t:1016_2: samathāya vūpasamāya sammukhāvinayo dātabbo…pe… tiṇavatthārako”ti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva.
